		<title>The Family</title>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Boss Carrion: The development</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=659</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Nov -0001 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=659</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I had been a collector of squeeky toy style elephants for a few years.

It seems there are so many varieties, sizes, and styles. I am constantly seeing ones I never knew existed.

This was my main inspiration in making Boss Carrion. He would fit the Elephants and the standard size Kaiju figures.

He was cute, gross, and weird.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-662" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=662"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-662" title="The Family" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/The-Family-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="269" /></a>

The arms, legs, head, and fish all came apart and were held on with wooden pegs so I could test

the sitting position and movement range.

I didn't have any sketches, the sculpt rolled out of my mind very smoothly.

Here's a shot of the original sculpt, still very raw.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-663" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=663"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-663" title="BC2R" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/BC2R-375x500.jpg" alt="" width="375" height="500" /></a>

I had decided while sculpting that some form of creature was needed on his rear.

He was made of various fused animal parts. I was inspired by a certain Kaiju named "Magnetudon" from a 70's TV show called

"Spectraman"and decided on a fish. Magnetudon had a catfish for a tail!

I had gone through about 3 different tail fish before I settled on the last one.

One dropped and broke, one got burned, and this one failed my approval.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-664" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=664"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-664" title="Fish" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Fish-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

Testing sitting pose.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-677" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=677"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-677" title="Boss Carrion sitting" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Boss-Carrion-sitting-352x500.jpg" alt="" width="352" height="500" /></a>

Here is the final sculpt all surfaced and polished up.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-661" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=661"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-661" title="Boss Carrion Right" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Boss-Carrion-Right-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

Here's a shot of the "Bat Hand" in an earlier sculpt.

I thought it was too flat, but I had a limit because it needed to be able to slip out of the mold during production.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-666" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=666"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-666" title="BC bat hand" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/BC-bat-hand-375x500.jpg" alt="" width="375" height="500" /></a>

Imagine the excitement of getting the first test shot in the mail!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-673" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=673"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-673" title="Boss Carrion test shot" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Boss-Carrion-test-shot-370x500.jpg" alt="" width="370" height="500" /></a>

Then the painted test shot!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-674" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=674"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-674" title="4x6_postcard_boss" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/4x6_postcard_boss-340x500.jpg" alt="" width="340" height="500" /></a>

Painting the Black and Silver version.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-675" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=675"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-675" title="Black painted" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Black-painted-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="449" /></a>

Painting the Blue version.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-676" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=676"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-676" title="Blue painted" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Blue-painted-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="449" /></a>

I've developed some tricks for Boss Carrion using magnets and

plan on making strange accessories to be included with him as a surprise!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-650" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/gallery/649/attachment/biter-face/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-650" title="Biter face" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Biter-face-365x500.jpg" alt="" width="365" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>test raffle</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/test-raffle/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 11 Nov 2010 05:22:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="alignright" title="Blobpus X PK" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/Blobpus-X-PK-445x500.jpg" alt="" width="267" height="300" />This very special and limited BLObPUS 6th anniversaryBoss Carrion is available by lottery system.
<h3>48 Hour lottery - Please read official rules:</h3>
<ul>
	<li>Only entries through the<strong>official form below</strong> will be accepted.</li>
	<li>Only <strong>one </strong>entry per person/household.</li>
	<li>Duplicate entries will be ineligible.</li>
	<li>Winners  will have the opportunity to purchase one BLObPUS 6th anniversary Boss Carrion via <strong>paypal</strong>, <strong>check </strong>or <strong>money order</strong>.</li>
	<li>Winners will be chosen by <a href="http://www.random.org/">random number generation</a> and will be notified within 72 hours of lottery closing.</li>
	<li>For adult collectors only!</li>
	<li><strong>$90.00 USD</strong> + Shipping</li>
	<li>Per agreement between Paulkaiju + Blobpus, This raffle is <strong>not</strong> available to entries from <strong>Japan</strong>. Thanks for your understanding.</li>
</ul>
<!--cforms name="test form"-->

Translated from <a href="http://blog.goo.ne.jp/blobpus-mm/">Blobpus blog</a>:
<blockquote>"BLObPUS 6th anniversary! !
Followed by international artists.
Appearance and the delicate work of athletic
The great gap "Paulkaiju" said the
BLObPUS Boss Carrion appeared luminous color version! !
Details of the right arm at the adorable elephant motif
Sukaruburoppu BLObPUS also similar to the
Comes a feeling of intimacy.
Sitting still can not calm a soft vinyl."</blockquote>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Paulkaiju FAQ</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=899</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Nov -0001 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=899</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Q: What exactly is Boss Carrion?</strong>

A: Boss Carrion is a demon composed of various animal corpses and full of worms.

<strong>Q:How often are Boss Carrion Releases? Why are they always sold out?</strong>

A: I keep releases very random. I can never really say. Many people think I should constantly have a back-stock, but it doesn't work that way. I do it like the Japanese toy producers. each release is a song. Never performed twice. Each run is a very limited piece of art. There are specific Japanese vinyl toys it took me 2-3 years to find for my collection. It makes collecting fresh and fun if you really like it. Many people sell off their collections after a year, so why flood the aftermarket?

<strong>Q: Why can't I order a one-of-a-kind custom Boss from you? Or a blank?
</strong>

A:If I do one for you, I have to do one for everybody. I might possibly do a blank release in the future, or possibly a custom show. i am also planning to do lotteries for one off Bosses. it's more fair.

<strong>Q: Are you planning more vinyls?</strong>

A: Yes I am currently sculpting some.

<strong>Q: Will you paint my western platform toy for an exhibit?</strong>

A: I put MUCH work into customizing toys. Intense work people aren't willing to spend on and the percentage of what most galleries take.

Plus, it depends on how much I like the piece really.

<strong>Q: Will you custom paint my Japan made Vinyl?</strong>

A: It depends on what you want. If you let me go nuts it works better. many people have special requests beyond my regular styles and it often turns into a nightmare for both parties.

if you know what you want, it's usually a win.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>DesignerCon 2012 Schedule and Raffle Rules</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/dcon2012/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 01 Nov 2012 23:22:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?page_id=1878</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h3><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1883" title="web teaser" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/web-teaser1-600x429.png" alt="" width="600" height="429" /></h3>
&nbsp;
<h2><strong><strong>9:00 am: Raffle ticket Distribution - Booth 109
</strong></strong></h2>
<ul>
	<li>Come to <strong>booth 109</strong> to pick up your free ticket.</li>
	<li>Tickets will be handed out from when the doors open until noon.</li>
	<li>One ticket per customer.</li>
	<li>Return to the booth at noon!</li>
</ul>
<div></div>
<ul>
	<li><em>To keep things fair</em>, absolutely no pre-sales, reservations or special requests will be taken.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<h2><strong><strong>12:00 noon: Raffle ticket Drawing - Booth 109</strong></strong></h2>
<ul>
	<li>Raffle tickets will be randomly drawn.</li>
	<li>Ticket holders must be present at the time of the drawing to make a purchase.</li>
	<li>Purchases are limited to:
<ul>
	<li>One (1) full size figure per person</li>
	<li>Resin minis, Mini figures and finger puppets: one per person of each colorway.</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>Payments are accepted in Cash, Visa, AMEX, Mastercard or Discover</li>
	<li>The raffle is limited to supplies on hand. Having a raffle ticket does not guarantee product availability</li>
	<li>Remaining stock after the raffle will be available at the table.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;

<a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/2012/10/29/tag-dcon-signings-and-exclusives-info/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1905" title="pkgreenedit-600x600" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/pkgreenedit-600x600-500x500.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="500" /></a>
<h2>2:00 - 2:30pm TAG Booth Signing - Booth 400</h2>
<ul>
	<li>Limited editions of Pollen Kaisers and Luftkaisers will be available.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<a href="http://dketoys.com/blog/2012/10/31/super-suck-up-hotline-or-how-to-buy-them-dang-figures-if-you-are-not-at-designer-con/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1904" title="IMG_1001-333x500" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/IMG_1001-333x5001.jpg" alt="" width="333" height="500" /></a>
<h2>3:00 DKE Booth Signing</h2>
<ul>
	<li>Super Suck Up! Paulkaiju x Sucklord Sausage Maker available .</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Paulkaijupus #1 The Blue-ring</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/paulkaijupus-1-the-blue-ring/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 13 Sep 2007 17:22:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=7</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Every once in a while, we need to take a break and bustloose on something cheap.

<img width="180" src="http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1137/1357871169_b338bab593_m.jpg" height="240" style="width: 180px; height: 240px" />

I chose to do The Blue-Ring Octopus. One of the most deadly creatures on earth aside from spoiled Turkey.

<img width="375" src="http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1271/1363751526_d54a27661c.jpg" height="500" style="width: 375px; height: 500px" />

Imagine being paralyzed, but being able to hear and see everyone talking about how dead you are.

And you can't even feel it bite you.]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>

		<wp:post_name>paulkaijupus-1-the-blue-ring</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="blog"><![CDATA[blog]]></category>

			<wp:comment_id>5</wp:comment_id>

	<item>
		<title>Monster Mash!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/monster-mash/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 Sep 2007 03:03:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=9</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img src="http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1440/1435363707_824cded323.jpg" height="500" width="355" />

Monster Mash at Super 7!

Super7 is proud to present the Halloween Monster Mash custom art show, featuring the custom figures of a variety of artists from both sides of the Pacific! Western and Eastern artists come together to create the coolest collection of customs ready to haunt your shelf for the month of October.

This show will be the first, last and only release ever for the Nathan Jurevicius' Fauna characters. Direct from MTV Canada and Nathan himself, these three monster miscreants will only be released here, and this will be a rare chance to handle these near extinct species.

Speaking of little known species, a new Beetle has been found in the remote wilderness of Japan - Beetlar! This orange vinyl figure with black and silver has never been released before and will make it's worldwide debut at the Monster Mash show.

Another dramatic debut is the latest top secret figure from the twisted bubble-gum mind of Le Merde. A fan favorite, you know Le Merde has the rock on lock, Burger Buns on the brain and plenty hidden up his sleeves. Don't miss your chance to own the latest addition to the Le Merde arsenal of awesome.

Not to be outdone, we present a collection of custom figures from the Super7 friends and family kaiju support network. Heavy hitters Paul Kaiju, Kathie Olivas, Koji Harmon, Kyoka Ikeda, Brian Flynn, Hiro Hayashi, Joe Huerta, Josh Herbolsheimer and Leecifer rub elbows and swap paint with Skullbrain.org regulars and SF locals for a fun filled evening of colorful vinyl chaos.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Good things come in small packages of three!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/good-things-come-in-small-packages-of-three/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 19 Oct 2007 23:33:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=11</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I just received this set of ILANENA EMUPAIYA monsters released at Pachikaijusummit 2007.I've seen the larger versions, but I'm a total fan of mini size. They are pink, yet actually glow in the dark.

<img width="439" src="http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2146/1642800748_df53045fdb.jpg" height="361" style="width: 439px; height: 361px" />

L to R we have Space eel Metorokabyan, H Hydrogen beast,and my fave of the bunch Fifth Dimension Monster BETARUS who is all over the place! Just another nice day hanging out on the putting green without their clubs.

<img align="left" width="180" src="http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2318/1642797232_41f08a90c7_m.jpg" height="240" /> <img width="180" src="http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2194/1642799526_464efb2415_m.jpg" height="240" /> <img width="180" src="http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2195/1641922457_4107c12989_m.jpg" height="240" />

It's my understanding that these are based on old made-up monsters (Patchi-Kaiju) immortalized on playing cards back in the 70's.

ILANENA has also made a few other color ways I think I will need to get.These are a total pocket size treat.

Check out BETARUS from the rear. Ain't he one cute messed up fifth dimensional baby!

<img width="180" src="http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2038/1642798806_fccfc4ccd9_m.jpg" height="240" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>A Tropical Flower in Bloom?</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/a-tropical-flower-in-bloom/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 14 May 2008 03:59:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=16</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img src="http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2093/2491578326_72bc1eb9fa_o.jpg" height="421" width="350" />]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>16</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2008-05-13 22:59:01</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2008-05-14 03:59:01</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>a-tropical-flower-in-bloom</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="blog"><![CDATA[blog]]></category>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Marmit Jomon Figure</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/marmit-jomon-figure/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 14 May 2008 04:15:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=17</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[This is a vinyl version of a <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog%C5%AB">Dogu</a> figure from the Jomon period.

<img src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3075/2461538729_8164899686.jpg" height="500" width="375" />

Ever since seeing the movie "Chariots of the Gods" as a child I have always dreamed of owning one.

Little would I expect it would be a vinyl version, but I was just as into it!

I thought the vinyl color was a bit too much like chocolate, so I converted it to more of a grey stone type color.

Can't say I regret it! It really brought out the details.

<img src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3101/2461922001_db6d760a60_o.jpg" height="500" width="375" />]]></content:encoded>

		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1037</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Nov -0001 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[My thoughts go out to everyone affected by these recent events every hour of]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1037</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2011-03-12 20:41:42</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>0000-00-00 00:00:00</wp:post_date_gmt>

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Kaiju For Japan&quot; Chibi Alien Welts!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1041</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Nov -0001 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1041</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[As a the horrible Earthquake and Tsunami tragedy has recently gripped Northern Japan, Troy Stith of Gorilla Mouth has started <a href="http://www.gorillamouth.com/2011/03/kaiju-for-japan.html">"Kaiju For Japan"</a>.

I am donating 13 hand cast "Chibi Alien Welts" to be sold and money donated for earthquake and tsunami relief.

Each is also hand painted by me in a one-time exclusive colorway.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1042" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=1042"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1042" title="Kaiju for Japan chibi Welt" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Kaiju-for-Japan-chibi-Welt-555x500.jpg" alt="" width="555" height="500" /></a>

Each comes sealed and protected in a plastic Easter Egg.

They are very small, the price is reasonable, and their true cause is so much more meaningful!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1043" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=1043"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1043" title="Chibi hatch" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Chibi-hatch-600x483.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="483" /></a>

I'm sure there will be many many more amazing toys , prints and other mediums from other fantastic artist in the toy scene to choose from!

Troy has informed me he is getting the sales ready and my little critters are on the way to him!

Stay tuned to <a href="http://www.gorillamouth.com/2011/03/kaiju-for-japan.html">Gorilla Mouth Blog</a> for details on "Kaiju for Japan"!

Thanks!]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Boss Carrion &quot;Mystery date&quot; set info</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-mystery-date-set-info/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 28 May 2013 15:31:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=2024</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2025" title="Mystery date" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Mystery-date--400x500.jpg" alt="" width="400" height="500" />

Boss Carrion green vinyl, Salamander Joe green vinyl, Mockbat flesh vinyl, Unchiman flesh vinyl.

Green vinyl Boss Carrion will include ONE of three possible and uniquely painted "blind dates" picked and shipped randomly.

A great surprise 2 figure set!

Boss Carrion, Salamander Joe, Mockbat (includes alternate parts and Hellmock!), and Unchiman will NOT be sold separately and are VERY limited.

Each set will retail $250 plus S &amp; H to be determined. ONE set per person.

ON Sunday 6/2/2013 at 12:00 PST the 24 hour Online "Raffle to purchase" form will appear on<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/">THIS blog</a>.

Please note: Reservations, special requests, MULTIPLE ENTRIES, MULTIPLE ENTRIES, MULTIPLE ENTRIES, orentries via comments or personal email will not be accepted or tolerated.]]></content:encoded>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Wanted to see what a "Zag" would look like if it were a remote controlled Plamodel.

After all, the early vinyl Marusan Godzilla was based on the model and a cheaper alternative for kids.

So it's only natural it seems. I think it represents a good simulation.

<img src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3198/2870604577_364bb975ae.jpg" width="500" height="375" />

The head lights up, but the "Faux remote" is borrowed from the M-1 Diamajin replica model.]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Mey!!!!!

Has many eyes!!!

<img width="352" src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3111/3145968582_c738466a27.jpg" height="500" style="width: 352px; height: 500px" />

January 11 at Superfestival 48

I've done 10 of these beauties available at Superfestival:

<img width="335" src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3212/3148386280_950347479a_o.jpg" height="454" style="width: 335px; height: 454px" />

Tokyo show will be at the 8-style gallery above the shop in Koenji on from Friday January 16 - Sunday January 18th.

Then off to Brooklyn TBA!

So many great artists in this show! You don't want to miss it!

More info soon!

		<title>Custom Dotty Rojo ojo</title>

	<item>
		<title>Onell designs!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/zudons-are-shipping/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 15 May 2009 16:07:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=62</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Must have been about a year ago (or longer?)my good friendRoger left these samples with me during his visit to the west coast.

I found them in a plastic container on my computer desk behind my monitor where things don't belong.

"Oh snaperz! I really need to paint some of these." Out to the shack I went.

I had the pleasure of meeting Matt from Onellat 08' SDCC (a really cool guy!) and had beenconcentrating on larger one-eyed things and forgot to give thesethese a try and some Craybooth in my spraybooth!

I'm glad I finally did, these things are a blast to paint. My humble appologies to Roger, maybe it was the Okinomyaki and the pitcher of Ichiban draft that made my mind wander? To those in the know...it happens!



Bad excuse.

<img class="alignnone" src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3373/3513015407_2b984041ee.jpg" alt="" width="375" height="500" />

<a href="http://www.onelldesign.com/">http://www.onelldesign.com/</a>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>REAL X HEAD x Paulkaiju PRINCE AMOEBA!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/real-x-head-x-paulkaiju-prince-amoeba/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jun 2009 04:45:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=79</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Grown from a microscopic hell-world comes "Prince Amoeba" !

<a href="http://realxhead.jp/">Real X Head</a> and Paulkaiju.com team up for this exclusive and awesome release!

The first run will be available at <span style="font-weight: bold;"><a class="postlink" onclick="window.open(this.href);return false;" href="http://amapro.hp.infoseek.co.jp/ibento.html">Pachi Summit Summer!</a></span> @1PM at Loft Plus One in <a class="postlink" onclick="window.open(this.href);return false;" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinjuku">Shinjuku</a>.

More will be available stateside in my shop 4/11/09!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-78" title="Prince Amoeba" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/moerbs-300x236.jpg" alt="Prince Amoeba" width="446" height="350" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Ash of Death!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/ash-of-death/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 10 Jul 2009 00:34:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=82</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I was a very lucky guy this week!
I received an amazing gift from my friend and fellow Garamon fanatic Mike of<a href="http://garamania.blogspot.com/"> Garamania!</a>

<a href="http://garamania.blogspot.com/"></a><a href="http://garamania.blogspot.com/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-83" title="ash-of-death-i" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/ash-of-death-i-225x300.jpg" alt="ash-of-death-i" width="304" height="405" /></a>

The eyes are chilling fear beaming red-hots, the paint job stunning and there's something extra:

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-84" title="ash-of-death-ii" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/ash-of-death-ii-207x300.jpg" alt="ash-of-death-ii" width="388" height="562" />

Behold the ashes of the damned!!!!

There's a very interesting story behind this. As most Kaiju freaks, as us, like to feed upon.

Freaks such as ourselves like to ace in the obscure tidbits left for us and strengthen up the monster biology.

Some of which might be old books of <a href="http://garamania.blogspot.com/2009/06/gara-innards-ash-of-death.html">Kaiju Anatomy</a>! Hey, we like to be fed obscure and it all counts!

And it gets mighty creepy!

Now I know what he was puking when he died. How did they clean that mess up?

Thanks Mike! You are Kaiju-soul!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>San Diego Comicon 2009!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/san-diego-comicon-2009/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Jul 2009 19:33:19 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=103</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Here's where I'll be involved for this year's San Diego Comicon. It's looking insane!

I'll have plenty of customs, exclusives, silliness, and fun stuff to do!

Drop by and say Hi and bring your paint markers!

<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-105" title="3701814614_b58c79932f_o1" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/3701814614_b58c79932f_o1.jpg" alt="3701814614_b58c79932f_o1" width="415" height="317" />

San Diego Convention Center
July 22 - 26

The Symposium will be a 5-day session with a variety of panels and presentations. GSF2009 is graciously hosted by <a href="http://onelldesign.com/">Onell Design</a> and <a href="http://callgrim.com/">Callgrim</a> at the San Diego Convention Center (SDCC#4937) . Don 'Datadub' Kratzer - Director of the <a href="http://www.fig-lab.com/">International Figure Research Laboratory</a> - will be giving the keynote and holding daily morning sessions on recent trends in figure culture from the far east. Afternoon sessions will feature many illustrious guest speakers and special exhibit. The final day will be an open day workshop to recap everything that was covered during the Symposium.

Chairman's Summary of the Global Figure Symposium
1. Share information about the dynamism of vinyl culture and its future: recent material developments, deformation theory and anticipated creature trends.

2. Explain the role of independently produced figures in promoting global economic growth and development and the collective accumulation impulse'S expanding contribution to the infrastructure for a global figure economy.

3. Highlight the value of the application of techno-animism and polymorphous perversity, drawing on examples from developed and developing cross-pollination projects.

<span style="font-weight: bold;">SCHEDULE</span> (subject to modification)<span style="color: red;">UPDATED! *07/10*</span>
07/22 wed
6pm - 9pm Fig-lab
KEYNOTE: Crawling Out from the Primordial Slime

07/23 thurs
9:30am - 1pm Fig-lab
TOPIC: Topological Taxonomies : Mutants, Monsters &amp; the Kai-Kya Horror Show
Featuring works from: Real x Head, Skulltoys, Blobpus, Monstock + more

<span style="color: #ff0000;">1pm - 3pm Millennial Masters
PANEL DISCUSSION: Phantasmagoric Color Collisions</span>

3pm - 5pm Dead Presidents
TOPIC: Kandy Kolored Kaiju

5pm - 7pm Fig-lab: Topological Taxonomies (reprise)

07/24 fri
9:30am - 1pm Fig-lab
TOPIC: Far East, Far Out:
Featuring works from: Zarigni Works, Goccodo, Art Denka, Uamou, Pop Soda, Spooky Parade, Hariken + more
<span style="color: #888888;"><span style="color: #ff0000;">
1pm - 3pm Paul Kaiju
TOPIC: Applied Dream Projection Theory vis-a-vis Vinyl Style Evolution.</span>
</span>
3pm - 5pm Suckadelic
TOPIC: Pop Iconography Piracy for Fun and Profit

5pm - 7pm Fig-lab - Far East, Far Out (reprise)

07/25 sat
9:30am - 1pm Fig-lab
TOPIC: Kaiju Invasion: the Third Wave
Featuring works from: Cord Viper, Yamomark, Sinbad, Dr. Strange Toys + more

1pm - 3pm Monstre Hero
TOPIC: Resinator Salvation

3pm - 5pm MISHKA
TOPIC: Straight Outta Brooklyn

5pm - 7pm Fig-lab - Kaiju Invasion: the third wave (reprise)

07/26 sun
9:30am - 5pm Open Day Workshop]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Thanks for an awesome SDCC 09!!!!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/thanks-for-an-awesome-sdcc-09/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 29 Jul 2009 03:50:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=119</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Just recovering from an amazing San Diego Comicon!!!

Thanks to all who attended , came to our booth,

and all the other great companies and artists that make this hobby SO damn amazing.

It was definitely a break-out for me!

Special thanks to <a href="http://fig-lab.com/blog/">FIG-LAB</a> and epecially to <a href="http://www.onelldesign.com/">Onell designs</a> for hosting the Global Figure Symposium!

Dead Dresidents designs, Lamour Supreme, Suckadelic, Monster Hero,

Real X Head, Uamao, Pop Soda, Super7,

Mishka, all the Brainers and krews ,

and of course <a href="http://super-junk.com/">SUPER-JUNK </a>for putting up with me

and my wacky ways!

Too many to list!

Words cannot express!

<img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-121" title="thanks1" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/thanks1-231x300.jpg" alt="thanks1" width="411" height="533" />

Nothing but great collaborations for here on out! On to the future...

Keep an eye on the shop for those sweet leftovers!]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Updates! Add yourself to my mailing list!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/updates-add-yourself-to-my-mailing-list/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 09 Oct 2009 05:16:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=173</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Plenty of cool things happening!

I know I keep saying that but that's coming from a one man show and between him and I ,we don't get crap done!

Please add yourself to my MAILING LIST to get live updated from my blog!

"PK goes Batshit. The Halloween Japan tour" on the horizon! I will be attending Designfesta AND Super 7 Tokyo Underground tour!

I'm very excited to see some friends!

Working on a STUPENDOUS collaboration with those resin casters and sculptors extraordinaire <a href="http://monstrehero.blogspot.com/">Monstre hero</a>! Most excited! I had the opportunity to meet these folks at SDCC 09'.

These guys rule my heart!

Most likely without a doubt Monstre hero is best indy toy soul in the USA. Why didn't I think of that? Anyway... i got slammed!

Amazing stuff!

One week official explosion!!! Until then, there's some "creeping updates".

Thanks!]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Here's a preview of Pogekkin in resin, sculpted by me and casted by the amazing folks at <a href="http://monstrehero.blogspot.com/">Monstrehero</a>!

		<title>Back from Tokyo!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/back-from-tokyo/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 Nov 2009 04:30:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=197</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[And struggling with jet lag, but it was all worth it. Time to get back to work! Lots of catch up to do!
Thanks to everyone I met and especially to all the folks in Japan that made Design Festa and being in fast paced Tokyo so great!

I should have leftovers up in my shop this week. (I know, I say that all the time!). Also, be prepared for some surprises!

<strong>PARTYBALL!</strong>

<img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-199" title="header1" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/header1-450x380.jpg" alt="header1" width="450" height="380" />

My first ever vinyl figure "Partyball" joins Super 7's Monster Family line! Partyball has a planned first release at <a href="http://www.vinyltoynetwork.com/">DesignerCon</a> in Pasedena.

I got to see the sculpt at Thrash Out store in Koenji this last Halloween and I'm beyond pleased!

I'll be doing a signing at 1:00 PM at the Super 7  booth! Hope to meet you there!]]></content:encoded>

<p style="text-align: left;">PK X BLObPUS Deadstocker "CON-RIT Blue claw Version"</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-219" title="Blue claw front" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/Blue-claw-front-444x600.jpg" alt="Blue claw front" width="217" height="292" /> <img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-220" title="Blue claw rear" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/Blue-claw-rear-424x600.jpg" alt="Blue claw rear" width="207" height="292" /></p>

	<item>
		<title> PARTYBALL the Demon Machine!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/partyball-the-demon-machine/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Nov 2009 19:50:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=225</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Introducing my first vinyl toy "Partyball", the Demon Machine!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-226" title="PARTYBALL" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/PARTYBALL-450x600.jpg" alt="PARTYBALL" width="450" height="600" />

Having a toy actually made in Japan is a dream come true!

Partyball is now a member of the "Monster Family" line of toys and produced by <a href="http://super7store.com/">Super 7</a>.

There's plenty of cool colorways being planned, as well as some of my own customs that I'm itching to do!!!

I look forward to seeing other folks customs with him as well.

Big thanks to Super 7 crew for making this happen!!!

Partyball makes his debut this Saturday, November 21st at <a href="http://www.designercon.com/">DesignerCon</a> in Pasedena.

I'll be signing at 1:00, Super 7 booth #63.

See you there!]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Big thanks to everyone who attended DesignerCon and made the Partyball release a fun and exciting experience!

I hope everyone came home with something that made them happy!!!

Big thanks to Super 7 and Monstrehero for hosting my works! I look forward to next year!

For those who missed out I have about 5 resin pieces I painted exclusively for the event left over!

Inqire if interested!

		<title>PK studios now in San Diego &amp; Kaiju Comrades 2!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/pk-studios-now-in-san-diego-kaiju-comerades-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 05 Mar 2010 18:49:00 +0000</pubDate>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=288</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Hello all! Long time no blog!

Recently I've changed location. I'm now in San Diego.

The dust has settled, massive toy collection supplies have been moved so it's back to work I go!

It's a going to be another busy and exciting year!

Super 7 and I have some awesome Partyball colorways and "hand paints" in the works.

I've also got a pile of unpainted resin figures sitting before me so stay tuned!

<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-289" title="4405931575_8c5201b245" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/4405931575_8c5201b245.jpg" alt="4405931575_8c5201b245" width="340" height="500" />

Mark Nagata and Kaiju Comrades 2
March 12th, 13th and 14th, 2010
Design Festa Gallery, East Room #303 Tokyo, Japan
Global Artists and their interpretations of Kaiju
Curated by Mark Nagata. Complete list of artists participating in this  show please click on the News &amp; Exclusives link below !
Show is free of charge, exclusives go on sale at the Gallery in Japan,  March 12th thru the 14th. If anything is left we will post the reminder  to the web site, so keep checking back.

Link:<a href="http://www.one-up.org/kc2.htm"> Kaiju Comrades 2 </a>

Here's a sneak peek of some of my entries available at the show! This is only a minor part of what will be available!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-290" title="Welt fade in" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/Welt-fade-in-450x387.jpg" alt="Welt fade in" width="450" height="387" />

<em>Welt Sejin "Fade in" set.</em>

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-291" title="KCII Mix" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/KCII-Mix-449x600.jpg" alt="KCII Mix" width="449" height="600" />

<em>Unchiman Mint, Citrus, and Black Sesame! Yum?</em>

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-292" title="Unchijin" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/Unchijin-450x547.jpg" alt="Unchijin" width="450" height="547" />

<em>"Unchiman" acrylic on canvas board. 8 X 10.</em>]]></content:encoded>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Partyball only painted from the ankle down maybe? Hmmm.....

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-301" title="PK_tease" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/PK_tease-450x162.jpg" alt="PK_tease" width="450" height="162" />

Roll Call! The Saturday Morning Tradefest returns, this March 27th.  Toys, friends, chatting, and rumor has it, donuts, are all on the  agenda.

Oh, and something special from Paul Kaiju.

Saturday March  27th, 10am Pacific.

Super7 Store
1628 Post Street
San Francisco, CA 94115]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>YEILD for custom vinyl!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/yeild-for-custom-vinyl/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 23 Mar 2010 22:18:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=326</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-327" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/yeild-for-custom-vinyl/attachment/yield-1/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-327" title="Yield-1" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/Yield-1.jpg" alt="" width="239" height="320" /></a>

Thursday I'm off to Super 7 in St. Petersburg Florida! I've got tons to get done still!

A few classics, and a Partyball for just about anyone's taste!

"On the evening of March 27th, an altogether different kind of force will  overtake the cozy confines of Super7 Florida.

While Indy Cars will be  racing through the streets on the eve of the Honda Grand Prix of St.  Petersburg, the legendary painter, toy designer and socialite, Paul  Kaiju, will take center stage, displaying his amazing craft and skill in  the form of handpainted Japanese vinyl toys. Show starts at 7 p.m. and  runs until. This is one you don't wanna miss!"

Super7
720  2nd Street North
Saint  Petersburg, Florida 33701

Phone:  727-822-8685
Email:  info@super7florida.com
Twitter: twitter.com/super7_florida

See you there!

Here's a little preview!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-328" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/yeild-for-custom-vinyl/attachment/chromo-pestar/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-328" title="Chromo Pestar" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/Chromo-Pestar-449x600.jpg" alt="" width="449" height="600" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-329" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/yeild-for-custom-vinyl/attachment/pb4/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-329" title="PB4" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/PB4-436x600.jpg" alt="" width="436" height="600" />
</a>

Also, here's a little <a href="http://www.super7florida.com/2010/03/chatting-with-paul-kaiju.html">interview </a>I had with Super7 Florida!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Upcomming: THE DRAGATOMI NOT VINYL SHOW!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/upcomming-the-dragatomi-not-vinyl-show/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 27 Apr 2010 23:06:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=364</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I'll have about 6 resin figures in this show! All the usual suspects. Pogs, Welts, and Unchimen!
From the <a href="http://dragatomi.blogspot.com/">Dragatomi</a> Blog:
"This exhibit showcases lots of talented artists doing pieces that arent vinyl. It will feature resin, wood, glass, metal, etc You get the picture."

Sounds cool!

	<item>
		<title>Sculpting and Gunnzo!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sculpting-and-gunnzo/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 May 2010 03:01:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=376</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Wow what a year so far. And it's accelerating like the expanding universe we live within. Good times.

My studio here in old SD is really swinging. gearing up plenty of surprises (I like to keep secrets too!) for

probably the next 2 years. One thing I've discovered is that sculpting pulls the energy and turns the brain to jelly.

I think I like my jelly brain as long as I can give you cool toys.

Another thing is, going from sculpting back to painting is a really rough transition. I usually get the groove back around lunchtime.

You start sculpting in the morning, and before you know it it's time to sleep. Life's too damn short I tells ya!

Anyway...

If you happen to be in San Diego on May 29th there's a cool event at <a href="http://gunnzo.com/store/?utm_source=GUNNZO+List&amp;utm_campaign=ee7804c19f-OpenHouseReminder&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;mc_cid=ee7804c19f&amp;mc_eid=a042606164">Gunnzo</a>.

I will be hanging out, supporting the custom movement (I consider it a movement!), and judging a contest.

Should be fun! Show up and give Gunnzo some good ol' toy community support! Chika's super cool and her shop is really adorable!

As far as this weeks wax mashing, here's a little preview of the three dudes wearing really cheesy tree suits.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-377" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/sculpting-and-gunnzo/attachment/the-trees/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-377" title="THE TREES" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/THE-TREES-450x324.jpg" alt="" width="450" height="324" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>376</wp:post_id>

	<item>
		<title>The latest!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/the-latest/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 11 Jun 2010 02:40:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=383</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I managed to get my head out of the clay and the paint to get some figures to some shows!

Some of my figs (Sorry no pics!) make their way to a place i have long wanted to see. Beautiful Barcelona!

<a href="http://www.kaijuattack.com/">"Kaiju Attack Barcelona"</a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-387" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/the-latest/attachment/barcelona/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-387" title="Barcelona" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/Barcelona-450x338.jpg" alt="" width="450" height="338" /></a>

I have a piece for a <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/shows/upcoming-shows/rotobox-ganmettal-celsius-custom-show-and-exhibit-july-10-2010/">custom Celsius show at Toy Art Gallery</a>.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-386" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/the-latest/attachment/tag/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-386" title="TAG" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/TAG-434x600.jpg" alt="" width="434" height="600" /></a>

A little preview of my piece!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-390" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/the-latest/attachment/celsius/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-390" title="Celsius" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/Celsius-450x337.jpg" alt="" width="450" height="337" /></a>

And...

I have an interview up on <a href="http://www.vinylpulse.com/">Vinyl Pulse</a>! Thanks Kris for the warm welcome to wonderful San Diego too! It means a lot to me!

Toys, life, inspiration, and some food.

Check it <a href="http://www.vinylpulse.com/2010/06/interview-paul-kaiju.html#more">here</a>!

Here's a nice bonus pics of Datadub of Figlab and the <a href="http://www.artdenka.com/">Artdenka</a> guys at Design Festa freakin' with Unchiman. What a great bunch! Thanks dudes!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-391" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/updates/the-latest/attachment/denka/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-391" title="Denka" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/Denka.jpg" alt="" width="379" height="253" /></a>

Duty now! Thanks for reading!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>PK X KILLER J STAR PET</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/pk-x-killer-j-star-pet/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 01 Jun 2010 17:53:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=399</guid>
		<description></description>

<p style="text-align: left;">PK X KILLER J STAR PET</p>
<img style="width: 500px; height: 379px;" src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3655/3412373965_04e17213a9.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="379" />

PK X Killer J's second collaboration brings Star Pet! Both are blind packaged.

You will get either "Chromatophore" colorway (Shown) or a secret "Amphibian"colorway.

All in glow vinyl and packaged in crafty hand decorated carry box.

Star Pet is for adult collectors only.

Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery!

POGEKKIN PINK SPARKLE

<a rel="attachment wp-att-345" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/test-page/attachment/resin-pogekkin-pink-glitter/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-345" title="Resin pogekkin pink glitter" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/Resin-pogekkin-pink-glitter-427x600.jpg" alt="" width="342" height="480" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>Buff Monster&#039;s &quot;The Monster Within&quot; custom show at GR2!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/buff-monsters-the-monster-within-custom-show-at-gr2/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 24 Jun 2010 20:28:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=468</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/buff-monsters-the-monster-within-custom-show-at-gr2/attachment/buff-flyer/" rel="attachment wp-att-469"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/Buff-flyer.jpg" alt="" title="Buff flyer" width="400" height="588" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-469" /></a>
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/buff-monsters-the-monster-within-custom-show-at-gr2/attachment/buff-flyerback/" rel="attachment wp-att-484"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/Buff-flyerback.jpg" alt="" title="Buff flyerback" width="400" height="588" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-484" /></a>
<a href="http://www.buffmonster.com/">Buff Monster</a> custom show!

To quote Buff from his blog:
"I'm really excited about this show. It's the first time I've curated a show and the first time so many awesome artists have painted my toys. There are so many amazing pieces in the show, I hope you can make the opening! July 10th, see you there!"

My entry for the show.
"Charriot is the NOD"
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/buff-monsters-the-monster-within-custom-show-at-gr2/attachment/pk-x-buff-monster/" rel="attachment wp-att-474"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/PK-X-BUFF-MONSTER-374x500.jpg" alt="" title="PK X BUFF MONSTER" width="374" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-474" /></a>
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/buff-monsters-the-monster-within-custom-show-at-gr2/attachment/pk-x-buff-monster-rear-shot/" rel="attachment wp-att-481"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/PK-X-Buff-Monster-Rear-shot-374x500.jpg" alt="" title="PK X Buff Monster Rear shot" width="374" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-481" /></a>

Here's a slide show of the awesome entries so far!

		<title>Mystery revealed! BOSS CARRION test shot!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mystery-revealed-boss-carrion-test-shot/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 09 Jul 2010 02:20:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=505</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Here's a teaser pic of my new figure, "Boss Carrion"! 
A crazed animal-corpse-demon from the jungles of hell!
This is my first sculpt to ever be produced in vinyl! 
Made in Japan, Boss Carrion stands 8 inches tall.
I have to say after holding him I couldn't keep a secret any longer. 
The vinyl quality of this guy is really incredible as well!
I'm giving away quite a bit in this pic, but don't worry, there's plenty more crazy details to show soon! 
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mystery-revealed-boss-carrion-test-shot/attachment/crazed-zombie-elephant/" rel="attachment wp-att-506"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/Crazed-zombie-elephant-375x500.jpg" alt="" title="Crazed zombie elephant" width="375" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-506" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>SDCC 2010 is upon us!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-2010-is-upon-us/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Jul 2010 19:27:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=519</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[San Diego Comicon 2010 is within sight!
It's going to be the best yet! Out of control!!! Thanks to Onell Designs ,Rawshark, and Figlab for hosting!
Here's where to "catch" me!
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-2010-is-upon-us/attachment/catch-pk/" rel="attachment wp-att-520"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/Catch-PK-600x425.jpg" alt="" title="Catch PK" width="600" height="425" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-520" /></a>
Make sure to visit the Global Figure Symposium "Crossover" during the whole Comicon for the best toy surprises ever!
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-2010-crossover/attachment/4745560332_1f969ab050_b-1/" rel="attachment wp-att-500"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/4745560332_1f969ab050_b-1-447x500.jpg" alt="" title="4745560332_1f969ab050_b-1" width="447" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-500" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>SDCC 2010!!! BIG BIG Thanks!!!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-2010-big-big-thanks/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 27 Jul 2010 04:49:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=531</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[What a "Crossover" indeed!
Thanks to everyone who came and waited patiently for Boss Carrion, let me sign figures, and draw in their books! I had a wonderful time!
An even bigger thanks to everyone in the toy community who puts out such cool stuff, and makes it so great to be a part of!
Especially the whole Global Figure Symposium gang! I had the time of my life!
I'm planning another BOSS CARRION release in my shop for people who couldn't make it, so stay tuned!
Here's a shot of SDCC exclusive BITER MAN. The head sculpt was done by me, for Real X Head and painted by the legendary Goto San!
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-2010-big-big-thanks/attachment/biterman/" rel="attachment wp-att-532"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/Biterman-374x500.jpg" alt="" title="Biterman" width="374" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-532" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>TOXIC CATALYST! A resin invitational!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-a-resin-invitational/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 06 Aug 2010 03:28:41 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=539</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I've been gearing up for TOXIC CATALYST at Super7 August 21st!
the show is being curated by those kings of resin madness <a href="http://monstrehero.blogspot.com/">Monstrehero</a>!
There are more fantastic resin squeezers at this show than you can shake a mixing stick at! WOW!
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-a-resin-invitational/attachment/toxiccatalyst1/" rel="attachment wp-att-540"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/toxiccatalyst1-600x465.jpg" alt="" title="toxiccatalyst1" width="600" height="465" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-540" /></a>
I decided it was time to start sloshing my own for immediate gratification in the shop.
 MOCKBAT was chosen to cast and paint myself to be included in TOXIC CATALYST.
He was my first attempt at wax sculpting, and although I have many more sculpts on the side, decided he was best for the show!
So many people at this show, I'm sure there will be room for a few for you to see and purchase.
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-a-resin-invitational/attachment/mockbatz/" rel="attachment wp-att-541"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Mockbatz-600x449.jpg" alt="" title="Mockbatz" width="600" height="449" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-541" /></a>
TOXIC CATALYST opening will be on August 21st. At <a href="http://super7store.com/">Super7</a> store.
Super7 Store 1628 Post Street San Francisco, CA 94115
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-a-resin-invitational/attachment/toxic_back/" rel="attachment wp-att-549"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/toxic_back.jpg" alt="" title="toxic_back" width="600" height="465" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-549" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Baby Biters &amp; Red Carpet Kaiju at TAG!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/baby-biters-red-carpet-kaiju-at-tag/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 14 Aug 2010 19:38:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=554</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I decided to resin cast a new little friend.
Please welcome ta new member to the Biter family! BB Biter!
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/baby-biters-red-carpet-kaiju-at-tag/attachment/bb-biters/" rel="attachment wp-att-555"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/bb-biters-375x500.jpg" alt="" title="bb biters" width="375" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-555" /></a>
Here's Boss holding him up for all to show that the worms aren't exclusively his problem!
"See he's got em' too!"
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/baby-biters-red-carpet-kaiju-at-tag/attachment/boss-bb-biter-copy/" rel="attachment wp-att-556"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Boss-BB-Biter-copy-375x500.jpg" alt="" title="Boss &amp; BB Biter copy" width="375" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-556" /></a>
September 4th <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/shows/upcoming-shows/942010-red-carpet-kaiju-group-show/">TAG</a> will be hosting "Red Carpet Kaiju" a Monster group show. The show packs a wallop full of amazing artists, and I intend to pull out some big guns in custom painted resin and vinyl!
Here's a taste of one of my entries, "Death Circus" Boss Carrion.
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/baby-biters-red-carpet-kaiju-at-tag/attachment/death-circus-boss-carrion/" rel="attachment wp-att-561"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Death-Circus-Boss-Carrion-356x500.jpg" alt="" title="Death Circus Boss Carrion" width="356" height="500" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-561" /></a>
More info:
<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/baby-biters-red-carpet-kaiju-at-tag/attachment/print/" rel="attachment wp-att-562"><img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/ToyArtGallery_RedCarpetKaijuback.jpg" alt="" title="Print" width="544" height="800" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-562" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Boss Carrion Black and Blue versions!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-black-and-blue-versions/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Aug 2010 01:00:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=573</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<script type="text/javascript">// <![CDATA[
function EJEJC_lc(th) { return false; }
// ]]]]><![CDATA[></script>
<script src="http://www.e-junkie.com/ecom/box.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<h3>Boss Carrion Black Colorway</h3>
<a rel="attachment wp-att-616" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-black-and-blue-versions/attachment/boss-black-so/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-616" title="Boss Black SO" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Boss-Black-SO-347x500.jpg" alt="" width="347" height="500" /></a>
Boss Carrion in Black vinyl with silver highlights and red eyes! Boss Carrion is 7 1/2" tall and has 6 points of articulation.
Boss Carrion was sculpted by Paulkaiju and produced in Japan. For adult collectors only!
<h3>Boss Carrion Blue Colorway</h3>
<a rel="attachment wp-att-617" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-black-and-blue-versions/attachment/boss-blue-so/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-617" title="Boss Blue SO" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Boss-Blue-SO-340x500.jpg" alt="" width="340" height="500" /></a>
Boss Carrion in flesh base vinyl with heavy Blue, gold, pink highlights and red details!
Boss Carrion is 7 1/2" tall and has 6 points of articulation, sculpted by Paulkaiju, and produced in Japan. For adult collectors only!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Toxic Catalyst and Freeman&#039;s SUCKLORD 600 auction!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-and-freemans-sucklord-600-auction/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 24 Aug 2010 17:59:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=602</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Toxic Catalyst!</strong>

While I was not able to attend the AWESOME looking Toxic Catalyst show last weekend at Super7, some folks were there enjoying the gathering.

There are a few you can review here:
<a href="http://toybotstudios.blogspot.com/2010/08/toxic-catalyst-show-recap.html#more">Toybot Studios</a>
<a href="http://robotxmonster.blogspot.com/">Robotxmonster</a>
<a href="http://blog.neonmonster.com/gallery/romping-around-with-the-resonators-at-toxic-catalyst/">Neon Monster</a>

Left overs are still up at the <a href="http://super7store.com/art.html?p=5">Super 7</a> store!
Great looking show! Thanks to the artists, MONSTREHERO , Super 7, and all the great folks who attended!
Sweet Marrow Mockbat:
<a rel="attachment wp-att-603" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-and-freemans-sucklord-600-auction/attachment/sweet-marrow-tc/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-603" title="Sweet Marrow TC" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Sweet-Marrow-TC-446x500.jpg" alt="" width="312" height="350" /></a>

<strong>Freeman's SUCKLORD 600 Auction!</strong>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">Freeman's Auction House in Philly, the spot that hosted the Vader Project, is offering some of the juciest <em>SUCKLORD 600</em> figures from the <em>SUPER SUCKOFF</em> in their <a href="http://www.freemansauction.com/asp/searchresults.asp?pg=1&amp;ps=25&amp;st=D&amp;sale_no=1377">POP CUTURE</a> sale on September 3rd.</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;"><a rel="attachment wp-att-609" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-and-freemans-sucklord-600-auction/attachment/freemans-cov/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-609" title="Freemans cov" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Freemans-cov-384x500.jpg" alt="" width="384" height="500" /></a>
</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">
</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">My figure with it's beautiful header card for the Sucklord 600 will be included in this <a href="http://www.freemansauction.com/asp/fullCatalogue.asp?salelot=1377+++++281+&amp;refno=++747741">auction</a>!</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;"><a rel="attachment wp-att-608" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toxic-catalyst-and-freemans-sucklord-600-auction/attachment/sucklord/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-608" title="Sucklord" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Sucklord-567x500.jpg" alt="" width="567" height="500" /></a></span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">Registration info is <a href="http://www.freemansauction.com/buying.asp">HERE</a>.</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">Be sure and check out <a href="http://suckadelic.com/Realms2.html">SUCKADELIC</a>!
</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">
</span>

<span style="font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Red Carpet Kaiju&quot; group show at TAG opens this Saturday!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-kaiju-group-show-at-tag-opens-this-saturday/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 02 Sep 2010 22:28:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=710</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Be sure to make it to the opening of this show!

All the pieces I have entered represent quite a milestone for me, and I'm looking forward to celebrating with so many other amazing artists!

He's a preview:

<strong>Boss Carrion "Death Circus 4"</strong> <em>Vinyl, hand painted. Edition of 1</em>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-711" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-kaiju-group-show-at-tag-opens-this-saturday/attachment/boss-carrion-death-circus-4/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-711" title="Boss Carrion Death Circus 4" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/Boss-Carrion-Death-Circus-4-362x500.jpg" alt="" width="362" height="500" /></a>

<strong>Melon Mockbat</strong> <em>hand painted resin</em>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-712" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-kaiju-group-show-at-tag-opens-this-saturday/attachment/melon-mockbat/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-712" title="Melon Mockbat" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/Melon-Mockbat-446x500.jpg" alt="" width="446" height="500" /></a>

<strong>Boss Carrion "Death Circus3"</strong> <em>Vinyl, hand painted. Edition of 1</em>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-715" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-kaiju-group-show-at-tag-opens-this-saturday/attachment/boss-carrion-death-circus-3/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-715" title="Boss Carrion Death Circus 3" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/Boss-Carrion-Death-Circus-3-339x500.jpg" alt="" width="339" height="500" /></a>

From TAG's <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/shows/current-shows/942010-red-carpet-kaiju-group-show/">site</a>:

"Toy Art Gallery is proud to present our newest group show, Red Carpet  Kaiju! Weve invited some of the best monster and kaiju-inspired artists  from around the world to showcase their unique visions and talents  within this strange and wonderful sub-genre of art toys. Their work  spans from production toys and hand-painted customs to unique sculptures  made from a variety of mediums."

<a rel="attachment wp-att-713" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-kaiju-group-show-at-tag-opens-this-saturday/attachment/toyartgallery_rc_postcard_front/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-713" title="toyartgallery_RC_POSTCARD_FRONT" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/toyartgallery_RC_POSTCARD_FRONT-338x500.jpg" alt="" width="338" height="500" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-714" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-kaiju-group-show-at-tag-opens-this-saturday/attachment/toyartgallery_rc_postcard_back/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-714" title="toyartgallery_RC_POSTCARD_BACK" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/toyartgallery_RC_POSTCARD_BACK-338x500.jpg" alt="" width="338" height="500" /></a>

Opens September 4th at 7:00 PM!

See you there!

Toy Art Gallery
737 Seward St. #1
(off Melrose Ave)
Los Angeles, CA 90038
www.ToyArtGallery.com
info@toyartgallery.com]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Red Carpet thanks, Superfestival 54 &amp; New York for the future!!!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-thanks-superfestival-54-new-york-for-the-future/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 12 Sep 2010 21:13:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=726</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Thanks all who attended "Red Carpet Kaiju" at TAG!

What an amazing show!

Plenty of beautiful pieces left in the <a href="http://store.toyartgallery.com/">TAG shop</a> so grub-up before they're gone!

I had a great time, and must say Gino's collection is really amazing to see in person!

Upcoming, I will have pieces for <a href="http://artstorm.co.jp/sufes.html">Superfestival 54</a> in Japan.

I'm sending regular run "Squeek" which is milky white with Yellow and pink sprays,

and 4 one of a kind hand paints that include the notorious magnetic horror baby Biter!

Squeeky Ver: One off :

<a rel="attachment wp-att-727" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-thanks-superfestival-54-new-york-for-the-future/attachment/bc-series-3/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-727" title="BC Series 3" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/BC-Series-3-322x500.jpg" alt="" width="322" height="500" /></a> <a rel="attachment wp-att-728" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-thanks-superfestival-54-new-york-for-the-future/attachment/death-circus-6/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-728" title="Death Circus 6" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/Death-Circus-6-331x500.jpg" alt="" width="331" height="500" /></a>

Definitely going to <a href="http://www.newyorkcomiccon.com/en/NYCC/Events/The-Cultyard/">New York Comicon</a> and currently preparing some goodies and surprises! Stay tuned!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-733" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-thanks-superfestival-54-new-york-for-the-future/attachment/minty-breath/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-733" title="Minty breath" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/Minty-breath-600x414.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="414" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-728" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-carpet-thanks-superfestival-54-new-york-for-the-future/attachment/death-circus-6/">
</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>NEW YORK COMICON 2010!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2010/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 05 Oct 2010 05:11:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=741</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[October 8, 9 ,and 10th I will be attending <a href="http://www.newyorkcomiccon.com/">New York Comicon</a>!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-745" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2010/attachment/nycc-2010/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-745" title="NYCC 2010" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/NYCC-2010-356x500.jpg" alt="" width="424" height="595" /></a>

I will be joining the fantastic crew of <a href="http://www.onelldesign.com/">Onell Designs</a> at booth #2780.

I've been cooking up many resin and vinyl goodies!

Here's a preview of what I've been working on!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-750" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2010/attachment/squeeky-version/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-750" title="Squeeky version" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/Squeeky-version-600x398.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="398" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-752" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2010/attachment/pink-biter/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-752" title="Pink Biter" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/Pink-Biter-362x500.jpg" alt="" width="362" height="500" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-753" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2010/attachment/seedy-characters/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-753" title="seedy characters" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/seedy-characters-366x500.jpg" alt="" width="366" height="500" /></a>

And much, much, more!

Please drop by and say hi!

See you at the con!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Return from NYCC , and &quot;MONSTARS&quot; at Lower Haters! Hachoooo!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/return-from-nycc-and-monstars-at-lower-haters-hachoooo/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 14 Oct 2010 20:46:25 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=759</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>ESCAPE FROM NY!</strong>

I've been back from New York for a few days now.

The excitement got the best of me and I'm a bit sick.

But what a blast I had. Big thanks to the Onell crew for hosting me,

the east coast toy community for leading me to the fun,

and <a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/grizlli_atom/">Mr Grizlli Atom</a> for doing these fine prints...

<a rel="attachment wp-att-763" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/return-from-nycc-and-monstars-at-lower-haters-hachoooo/attachment/grizli-prints/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-763" title="Grizli prints" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/Grizli-prints-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="420" height="314" /></a>

and everyone who showed up and purchased my "special sort of madness".

I should will have available in my shop along with

leftovers from NYCC plus more Boss Carrion BUTTERCUP version!

As soon as I'm better! I would say in one to two weeks.

<strong>"MONSTARS" at Lower Haters
</strong>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-761" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/return-from-nycc-and-monstars-at-lower-haters-hachoooo/attachment/ms/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-761" title="ms" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/ms.jpg" alt="" width="425" height="638" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-760" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/return-from-nycc-and-monstars-at-lower-haters-hachoooo/attachment/ms-front/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-760" title="MS front" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/MS-front.jpg" alt="" width="430" height="645" /></a>

Here's the one off 'Blue" Boss for the show.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-762" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/return-from-nycc-and-monstars-at-lower-haters-hachoooo/attachment/blue-boss-monstars/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-762" title="Blue Boss Monstars" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/Blue-Boss-Monstars-332x500.jpg" alt="" width="425" height="639" /></a>

I'm popping my vitamins and hope to make it!

<strong>Opening Reception:</strong>

Friday Oct 15th, 2010

7pm-10pm

<strong>Lower Haters Gallery</strong>

597 Haight Street

San Francisco, CA

<a href="http://lowerhater.com/">http://lowerhater.com/</a>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Orange Partyball! </title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/orange-partyball/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 22 Oct 2010 17:26:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=771</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-772" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/orange-partyball/attachment/partyball_orange_blog/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-772" title="partyball_orange_blog" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/partyball_orange_blog.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="500" /></a>

Available, Saturday via Super 7, October 30th, $30 each.

To quote the Super 7 Blog:

"The Demon Machine is back from the depths, to rear its gnarly head!  From the monster-warped imagination of Paul Kaiju,

aka the dude who's  been doing this since before I was born,

comes the second painted  release of Partyball,

sporting colors that would make any vintage  Bullmark melt with envy."

Hey, beauty , knowledge and grace comes with age!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>GREEN DEATH!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/green-death/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 12 Nov 2010 20:34:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=775</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-785" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/green-death/attachment/olympus-digital-camera/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-785" title="OLYMPUS DIGITAL CAMERA" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Green-Death-poster-600x450.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="450" /></a>
Green Death : Available 11-13-10 at 12:00pm central.

"Designed by Brian Ralph, sculpted and cast by Scott Wilkowski. As a bonus we
have a very limited painted edition by Paul Kaiju.

2.75 resin figure comes packaged with a hand screenprinted poster by Brian
Ralph.

Editions:

(x10) Original Green  US$20

Special One Offs:  US$20

(x1) Green w/ Purple head
(x1) Translucent Dark Green
(x1) Dark Green w/ Green head
(x1) Green w/ Florescent Yellow head
(x1) Green w/ Dark Green head
(x1) Florescent Yellow w/ Green head
(x1) Translucent Dark Green w/ GID head

Paul Kaiju paint:  US$45

(x2) Pink w/ Green
(x2) Red w/ Black
(x3) Pearl w/ Purple

Shipping:
US$6
US$15 for International orders

Please email range@waxbeanstudio.com to place order. Specify which figure you
would like and your shipping address. I will email you back with confirmation
and instructions on how to complete the order. Orders will be taken in the
order in which they are received. Please give a second choice when ordering in
case your first choice is sold out."

<a href="http://www.scottwilkowski.com/">www.scottwilkowski.com</a>]]></content:encoded>
