	<item>
		<title>Designercon 2010!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/designercon-2010/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Nov 2010 02:51:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=792</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Hi all,

Taking a break from the bonds of elf-style self-induced toy slavery and posting to announce

<a href="http://www.designercon.com/">Desingner-con 2010</a>!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-793" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/designercon-2010/attachment/pasedena4/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-793" title="Pasedena4" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Pasedena4-452x500.jpg" alt="" width="586" height="648" /></a>

The MONSTREHERO, Uh Oh Toys, John Knox, and I will be there with a booth loaded with a

bounty of gorgeous hand-forged toy treats! You will be amazed!! Exiting and surreal adventure for the whole family!

Here's just a peek of what I will have to offer:

"Pollen Kaiser" will make his lightly painted debut! Take your antihistamines!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-794" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/designercon-2010/attachment/pollen-kaiser-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-794" title="Pollen Kaiser 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Pollen-Kaiser-2-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

Being a fan of vintage style character related Japanese tin cars I can't afford, I custom built these "Boss Cars" from Vintage tin, resin, decals, and tears.

I thought Boss Carrion deserved the "Vintage" treatment.

That cute little face riding around and running into other monsters makes me happy I took the plunge into PURE insanity.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-795" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/designercon-2010/attachment/bosscar/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-795" title="Bosscar" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Bosscar-600x460.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="460" /></a>

And Boss Carrion "Pinkysnouts" are still on the grill...but you know they'll be ready!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-796" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/designercon-2010/attachment/pinksnouts/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-796" title="Pinksnouts" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Pinksnouts-375x500.jpg" alt="" width="375" height="500" /></a>

Plus much. much MORE!

See you there!

PLEASE VISIT DESIGNERCON 2010 WEBSITE FOR MORE INFO!

<a href="http://www.designercon.com/">HERE!</a>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Boss Carrion &quot;Pinkysnout&quot; and &quot;Buttercup&quot;!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-pinkysnout-and-buttercup/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 20 Nov 2010 17:03:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<script type="text/javascript">// <![CDATA[
  function EJEJC_lc(th) { return false; }

<script src="http://www.e-junkie.com/ecom/box.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<p style="text-align: right;"></p>
<strong>Boss Carrion "Pinksnout"</strong> <strong>version</strong>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-840" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-pinkysnout-and-buttercup/attachment/dcon-pinksnout-sold-out/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-840" title="Dcon pinksnout SOLD OUT" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Dcon-pinksnout-SOLD-OUT-329x500.jpg" alt="" width="329" height="500" /></a>

Boss Carrion "Pinksnout" version sculpted and painted by Paulkaiju.

Made in Japan!

Light pink, Clear pink, Metallic green and blue on clear vinyl!

This toy is for adult collectors only!
<strong>SOLD OUT</strong>

<strong>Boss Carrion "Buttercup" version</strong>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-841" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-pinkysnout-and-buttercup/attachment/buttercup-sold-out/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-841" title="Buttercup SOLD OUT" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Buttercup-SOLD-OUT-335x500.jpg" alt="" width="335" height="500" /></a>

Boss Carrion "Buttercup" version sculpted and painted by Paulkaiju.

Made in Japan!

Painted with <span style="color: #ffff00;"><a href="http://monsterkolor.ning.com/">Monster Kolor</a></span> paints!

This toy is for adult collectors only!
<strong>SOLD OUT!</strong>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Boss Carrion and Designercon!</title>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Thanks all who attended Designer Con and came to visit us at booth 420. It was a great time and gets better every year!

Thanks to <a href="http://monstrehero.blogspot.com/">Monstrehero</a>, <a href="http://www.uhohtoys.com/">Uh oh toys</a>, and <a href="http://jonknoxstudio.com/">Jon Knox</a> for putting up with my mess!

Everyone who ordered a Boss Carrion for the 20th sale. I will be shipping after the Thanksgiving Holiday.

I need a break now, because I have tons slated to do!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-845" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-and-designercon/attachment/glowboss/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-845" title="Glowboss" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Glowboss-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="449" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>Catching my breath, blast off to the One Offs!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/catching-my-breath-blast-off-to-the-one-offs/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 22 Jan 2011 20:15:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=878</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Happpy 2011!

I'm off to a great start! Getting some works caught up on and out of the way.

It's a great warm up for getting back to business!

You can expect some releases in my shop soon, including a VERY special Boss Carrion!

Coming up, is the "One Offs" show at <a href="http://super7store.com/">Super 7 store</a> January 29th.

I'll have three VERY special Partyball for this show!

"Powder Fresh"

<a rel="attachment wp-att-880" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/catching-my-breath-blast-off-to-the-one-offs/attachment/one-of-two-for-the-one-offs/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-880" title="One of two for the One Offs" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/One-of-two-for-the-One-Offs-370x500.jpg" alt="" width="370" height="500" /></a>

What's going on here?

<a rel="attachment wp-att-881" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/catching-my-breath-blast-off-to-the-one-offs/attachment/juicy/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-881" title="juicy" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/juicy-600x491.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="491" /></a>

The other one you need to see at the show! Hah! It's pretty funny.

"From the studios, basements, garages and caves comes the One-Offs show  at Super7! Thirty plus artists break down, build up, spray, splatter,  polish and destroy vinyl toys to create something one of a kind.  Opening January 29th, 6pm Pacific."

<a rel="attachment wp-att-879" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/catching-my-breath-blast-off-to-the-one-offs/attachment/1-offs/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-879" title="1 offs" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/1-offs-600x399.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="399" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>878</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2011-01-22 12:15:18</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2011-01-22 20:15:18</wp:post_date_gmt>

	<item>
		<title>Comming soon! Paul Kaiju Boss Carrion [BLObPUS 6th Anniversary GID Ver.] </title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/comming-soon-paul-kaiju-boss-carrion-blobpus-6th-anniversary-gid-ver/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Jan 2011 15:41:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=903</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://blog.goo.ne.jp/blobpus-mm/">Blobpus</a> has been very inspirational to me and many, many, others over the years.

He has been a major component of the modern "Neo Kaiju" movement since it's early days.

It is quite a honor to have this amazing artist give my second vinyl toy his insane color treatment!

This very special and limited Boss Carrion will be available by lottery system to be announced here soon.

Stay tuned to this spot!

<em><strong><em>For Japan purchase, please check out the <a href="http://blog.goo.ne.jp/blobpus-mm/">Blobpus blog</a> for further information!</em></strong></em>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-905" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/comming-soon-paul-kaiju-boss-carrion-blobpus-6th-anniversary-gid-ver/attachment/blobpus-x-pk/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-905" title="Blobpus X PK" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/Blobpus-X-PK-445x500.jpg" alt="" width="445" height="500" /></a>

Translated from Blobpus blog:

"<em>BLObPUS 6th anniversary! !
Followed by international artists.
Appearance and the delicate work of athletic
The great gap "Paulkaiju" said the
BLObPUS Boss Carrion appeared luminous color version! !
Details of the right arm at the adorable elephant motif
Sukaruburoppu BLObPUS also similar to the
Comes a feeling of intimacy.
Sitting still can not calm a soft vinyl."</em><strong><em> </em></strong>

<strong><em></em></strong>

	<item>
		<title>ILANENA 10th Anniversary Dai Kaiju Card Monsters Custom Toy Show</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/ilanena-10th-anniversary-dai-kaiju-card-monsters-custom-toy-show/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 03 Feb 2011 01:36:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=912</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-913" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/ilanena-10th-anniversary-dai-kaiju-card-monsters-custom-toy-show/attachment/ilanena/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-913" title="Ilanena" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Ilanena-354x500.jpg" alt="" width="354" height="500" /></a>

To  celebrate its 10 year anniversary, Tokyo-based Figure Label ILANENA is  having a special Exhibition in Nakano at the alternative cafe!!

Every  release-to-date of ILANENA's iconic Dai Kaiju Card Monsters -  encompassing a mind-boggling 73 unique sets - will be on display.  Additionally there will be a Custom Show featuring Daiju Kaiju Card  Monster sets by 23 select International Artists. As an added bonus, a  special collaboration between alternative comic virtuoso Jim Woodring  and Ilanena will be unveiled.

February 8th - 20th, 2011
alternative cafe, Nakano, Tokyo
party February 11th 18:0021:00

<em>Here's my entry. "Grandfather Magic". Based on the trick of disguising monsters for other "acting roles".</em>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-914" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/ilanena-10th-anniversary-dai-kaiju-card-monsters-custom-toy-show/attachment/illin/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-914" title="Illin" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Illin-600x436.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="436" /></a>

With some black light.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-917" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/ilanena-10th-anniversary-dai-kaiju-card-monsters-custom-toy-show/attachment/illin2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-917" title="Illin2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Illin2-600x447.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="447" /></a>

<!--more-->

alternative cafe
<a href="http://www.alternativecafe.jp/">http://www.alternativecafe.jp/</a>

ILANENA
<a href="http://www.ilanena.com/">http://www.ilanena.com</a>

Special support from Robot Robot and Presspop Gallery.
<a href="http://www.robotrobot.com/">http://www.robotrobot.com</a>
<a href="http://www.presspop.com/">http://www.presspop.com/</a>

Customs will be available for sale at the venue during the event and afterwards online through Fig-x.jp and Fig-lab.com.
<a href="http://fig-x.jp/">http://fig-x.jp</a>
<a href="http://fig-lab.com/">http://fig-lab.com</a>

-------------------------------------------------
Participating Artists

Aaron Blstr / Sqdblstr
<a href="http://www.sqdblstr.com/">http://www.sqdblstr.com/</a>

Brian Bunting / GalaxyPeople
<a href="http://galaxypeople.wordpress.com/">http://galaxypeople.wordpress.com/</a>

Brian Flynn / SUPER7
<a href="http://super7store.com/">http://super7store.com/</a>

Cliff Kirschner / MONSTREHERO
<a href="http://www.monstrehero.com/">http://www.monstrehero.com/</a>

Daniel Goffin
<a href="http://www.danielgoffin.com/">http://www.danielgoffin.com/</a>

Datadub / FIG-LAB
<a href="http://fig-lab.com/">http://fig-lab.com/</a>

Dennis Hamann / Shirahama
<a href="http://shirahamablog.blogspot.com/">http://shirahamablog.blogspot.com/</a>

FU Irene / Kaiju korner
<a href="http://kaijukorner.blogspot.com/">http://kaijukorner.blogspot.com/</a>

Ilanena Hoshina / ILANENA
<a href="http://www.ilanena.com/">http://www.ilanena.com/</a>

Jesse Moore / Rawshark Studios
<a href="http://callgrim.com/">http://callgrim.com/</a>

Jim Woodring
<a href="http://www.jimwoodring.com/">http://www.jimwoodring.com/</a>

Kirkland Jue / Toybot studios
<a href="http://toybotstudios.blogspot.com/">http://toybotstudios.blogspot.com/</a>

Koji Harmon / Cometdebris
<a href="http://www.cometdebris.com/">http://www.cometdebris.com/</a>

L'amour Supreme
<a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/lamoursupreme_fixedfiend/">http://www.flickr.com/photos/lamoursupreme_fixedfiend/</a>

LASH / Mutant Vinyl Hardcore
<a href="http://mutantvinylhardcore.blogspot.com/">http://mutantvinylhardcore.blogspot.com/</a>

Luke Rook / Lulubell Toys
<a href="http://www.lulubelltoys.com/">http://www.lulubelltoys.com/</a>

Mark Nagata / MAX TOY
<a href="http://www.maxtoyco.com/">http://www.maxtoyco.com/</a>

Matt Doughty / Onell Design
<a href="http://www.onelldesign.com/">http://www.onelldesign.com/</a>

Paul Kaiju
<a href="../../">http://paulkaiju.com/</a>

Ralph Niese / Bruno Orbit
<a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/bruno-five-oh">http://www.flickr.com/photos/bruno-five-oh</a>

Randy Borden / Kaiju Big Battel
<a href="http://www.kaiju.com/">http://www.kaiju.com/</a>

Ricky Wilson / VELOCITRON
<a href="http://www.velocitron.org/">http://www.velocitron.org/</a>

SUCKADELIC
<a href="http://suckadelic.com/">http://suckadelic.com/</a>

Sean Blay / MONSTREHERO
<a href="http://www.monstrehero.com/">http://www.monstrehero.com</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Blobpus Ver. Boss Carrion online Lottery! Saturday 12:00 AM </title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/blobpus-ver-boss-carrion-online-lottery-saturday-1200-am/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 04 Feb 2011 03:49:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=929</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 5px; font-size: 110%; font-weight: bold; background-color: yellow; color: black;">HOW TO ENTER: Visit paulkaiju.com between Saturday, February 5 (00:00 PST) - Sunday Feb 6 (23:59 PST). There will be a form for you to enter. SUBMISSIONS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED VIA EMAIL OR COMMENT.</div>
<a rel="attachment wp-att-934" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/blobpus-ver-boss-carrion-online-lottery-saturday-1200-am/attachment/blobleidascope/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-934" title="Blobleidascope" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Blobleidascope-600x473.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="473" /></a>
<div style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 5px; font-size: 110%; font-weight: bold; background-color: lime; color: black;">HOW TO ENTER: Visit paulkaiju.com between Saturday, February 5 (00:00 PST) - Sunday Feb 6 (23:59 PST). There will be a form for you to enter. SUBMISSIONS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED VIA EMAIL OR COMMENT.</div>
The online Lottery for the Blobpus version Boss Carrion will take place through this blog ONLY, Saturday the 5th at 12:00 AM California time!

The online form will remain up for 48 hours. Winners should be notified within 2-3 days!

The price will be $90 plus S &amp; H. One per person only.

Please note! I WILL NOT accept entries to my personal email, other forms of advanced entries, or any "advanced reservation requests"!

Entries from Japan will not be accepted, per agreement between Paulkaiju and Blobpus. Japan sales of this item have finished!

Boss Carrion is for adult collectors only!

Thanks for your patronage, understanding, and good luck to you! This vinyl figure is very beautiful, and beyond unique!
<div style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 5px; font-size: 110%; font-weight: bold; background-color: #ff38b2; color: black;">...in case you missed HOW TO ENTER: Visit paulkaiju.com between Saturday, February 5 (00:00 PST) - Sunday Feb 6 (23:59 PST). There will be a form for you to enter. SUBMISSIONS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED VIA EMAIL OR COMMENT.</div>
<a rel="attachment wp-att-904" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/comming-soon-paul-kaiju-boss-carrion-blobpus-6th-anniversary-gid-ver/attachment/blopboss5/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-904" title="Blopboss5" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/Blopboss5-367x500.jpg" alt="" width="367" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Boss Carrion x BLOBPUS Lottery entry form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-x-blobpus-lottery-entry-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 05 Feb 2011 08:00:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=954</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="background-color:yellow;padding:10px;color:black;font-size:120%;width:250px"> the Lottery is Closed</div>
<div>

<img class="alignright" title="Blobpus X PK" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/Blobpus-X-PK-445x500.jpg" alt="" width="267" height="300" />This very special and limited BLObPUS 6th anniversaryBoss Carrion is available by lottery system.
<h3>48 Hour lottery - Please read official rules:</h3>
<ul>
	<li>Only entries through theofficial form belowwill be accepted.</li>
	<li>Onlyoneentry per person/household.</li>
	<li>Duplicate entries will be ineligible.</li>
	<li>Winners will have the opportunity to purchase one BLObPUS 6th anniversary Boss Carrion viapaypal,checkormoney order.</li>
	<li>Winners will be chosen by<a href="http://www.random.org/">random number generation</a> and will be notified within 72 hours of lottery closing.</li>
	<li>For adult collectors only!</li>
	<li>$90.00 USD+ Shipping</li>
	<li>Per agreement between Paulkaiju + Blobpus, This raffle isnotavailable to entries fromJapan. Thanks for your understanding.</li>
</ul>


Translated from<a href="http://blog.goo.ne.jp/blobpus-mm/">Blobpus blog</a>:
<blockquote>"BLObPUS 6th anniversary! !
Followed by international artists.
Appearance and the delicate work of athletic
The great gap "Paulkaiju" said the
BLObPUS Boss Carrion appeared luminous color version! !
Details of the right arm at the adorable elephant motif
Sukaruburoppu BLObPUS also similar to the
Comes a feeling of intimacy.
Sitting still can not calm a soft vinyl."</blockquote>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Feburary 26th! Two shows! PK and LCFR at Super 7 and Mark Nagata&#039;s Alien Argus group show at TAG!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 19 Feb 2011 18:47:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=991</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="color: #ff99cc;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">PK and LCFR at Super 7</span></span>

In a whirlwind attack, Leecifer and I combine forces to give San Francisco one killer show for the end of February!

At <a href="http://super7store.com/">Super 7</a> store!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-992" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/attachment/pk_lcsf_s7_show_eflier/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-992" title="PK_Lcsf_S7_Show_eFlier" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/PK_Lcsf_S7_Show_eFlier-333x500.jpg" alt="" width="333" height="500" /></a>

Here's one preview of what i will be bringing, as well as some vinyl and resin surprises!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-995" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/attachment/battle-racers/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-995" title="Battle racers" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Battle-racers-387x500.jpg" alt="" width="387" height="500" /></a>

<em>Boss Racer Vs. Bitemobile-X playset. Resin, Styrene, and <a href="http://monsterkolor.ning.com/">Monster Kolor</a> on vintage tin cars. Limited to ONE</em>

Also!

Some nice exclusives for the show! Including the premier release of Leecifer's Monster Family member The Flame!

Partyball in those cool Mecha Godzilla style colors too! Metallic colored Vinyl! Wild! I've wanted to see this for some time!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-997" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/attachment/2_26_release/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-997" title="2_26_release" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/mecha-Partyball.jpg" alt="" width="400" height="387" /></a>

<!--more-->

<span style="color: #ff99cc;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Mark Nagata's Alien Argus group show at TAG</strong></span></span>

Mark Nagata of <a href="http://www.maxtoyco.com/">Maxtoy</a> and <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/">Toy Art Gallery</a> are having a group show featuring artists from around the globe taking their spin on Max Toy's Alien Argus figure!

The amount of talent in this show should be one mind warping galactic Pow-wow!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-993" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/attachment/argus_postcard_front/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-993" title="ARGUS_POSTCARD_front" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/ARGUS_POSTCARD_front-360x500.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="500" /></a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-994" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/attachment/argus_postcard_back/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-994" title="ARGUS_POSTCARD_back" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/ARGUS_POSTCARD_back-360x500.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="500" /></a>

Here's an image of my entry, "Diane Argus"(Silly name I know, but it stuck!).

<a rel="attachment wp-att-996" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/feburary-26th-two-shows-pk-and-lcfr-at-super-7-and-mark-nagatas-alien-argus-group-show-at-tag/attachment/argus-3/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-996" title="Argus 3" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Argus-3-349x500.jpg" alt="" width="349" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>PK X Leecifer show at Super 7 incredible!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/pk-x-leecifer-show-at-super-7-incredible/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 03 Mar 2011 06:00:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1015</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Thanks to all who came out for our show at Super 7 store!

It was a fantastic time and what a fantastic show!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1031" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/pk-x-leecifer-show-at-super-7-incredible/attachment/pk-and-lee-3/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1031" title="PK and Lee" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/PK-and-Lee-2-333x500.jpg" alt="" width="333" height="500" /></a>

There's a few really nice pieces by Lee and I left in the Super 7 <a href="http://super7store.com/art/custom-toys.html">shop</a> , so go grub up!

Many one of a kind pieces , like Lee and I do best!

<!--more-->

Seagool!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1021" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/pk-x-leecifer-show-at-super-7-incredible/attachment/seagool/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1021" title="Seagool" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Seagool-354x500.jpg" alt="" width="354" height="500" /></a>

So you found out Seagool had two heads?

One birdbrain can't chase the other out of the nest it seems?

Seagool was available in a very limited run in resin. He will return eventually in a different "form" of materials!

Namely the "V" type.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1017" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/pk-x-leecifer-show-at-super-7-incredible/attachment/seagool-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1017" title="seagool 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/seagool-2-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

Lots of things shaking here at Paulkaiju.com! A bit more than I can hold back!

2011 will be killer!

Stay tuned!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1018" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/pk-x-leecifer-show-at-super-7-incredible/attachment/mystery-meat-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1018" title="Mystery meat 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Mystery-meat-2-313x500.jpg" alt="" width="313" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Hi all,

My thoughts and best hopes go to my friends and all people of Japan in what they are curently dealing with.

Give $5 - it'll make you feel great!

I plan on donating some customs to this cause!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Kajiu for Japan, and forging forward furiously!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/kajiu-for-japan-and-forging-forward-furiously/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 22 Mar 2011 16:14:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1048</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Kaiju for Japan</strong></span>

Hi All!

I've sent off a batch of these special "Chibi" style Alien Welts off to Troy for the <a href="http://www.gorillamouth.com/2011/03/kaiju-for-japan.html">"Kaiju for Japan"</a> benefit for Earthquake and Tsunami relief.

They were sculpted, cast and painted by me and come in a protective Easter "style" egg. (it was perfect timing and a perfect fit!)

Small figure, fair price, greater cause!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1042" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=1042"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1042" title="Kaiju for Japan chibi Welt" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Kaiju-for-Japan-chibi-Welt-555x500.jpg" alt="" width="555" height="500" /></a>

Stay tuned to <a href="http://www.gorillamouth.com/2011/03/kaiju-for-japan.html">Gorilla Mouth</a> Blog for info soon!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1043" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?attachment_id=1043"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1043" title="Chibi hatch" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Chibi-hatch-600x483.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="483" /></a>

Also, should anyone be at <a href="http://blog.super7store.com/black-white-show-connells-birthday-bash">Super 7 store</a> on march 26th for the "Black/White show",

I've sent them a clutch of "Blind eggs" in honor

of our good friend Connell's coinciding birthday bash!

Each contains a individually hand painted exclusive version!

Crack them, trade them, collect them!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1058" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/kajiu-for-japan-and-forging-forward-furiously/attachment/blind-eggs/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1058" title="Blind eggs" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Blind-eggs-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="449" /></a>

<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Future releases!</strong></span>

<!--more-->

In case you are wondering what this strange thing is...

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1049" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/kajiu-for-japan-and-forging-forward-furiously/attachment/img_0236/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1049" title="IMG_0236" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Copper-mold-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

This is a picture of the copper mold for my new vinyl toy "Salamander Joe"!

It's obvious to see here, you can't keep Tokyo down so soon after a major disaster.

Pretty inspiring. I'm floored from this fact.

Now , I will break some confusion.

Salamander Joe is the giant form of Alien Welt. A creature who has the ability to change size at will.

He was sculpted to stand with his enemy the Boss Carrion in equal size!

Test shot photos will be posted as soon as I have it in hand, which should be very soon!

As I remember, the sculpt was pretty strange and had a fancy "Extra". More later.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1050" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/kajiu-for-japan-and-forging-forward-furiously/attachment/mystery-meat-2-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1050" title="Mystery meat 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Mystery-meat-21-313x500.jpg" alt="" width="313" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>&quot;April Candy&quot; Boss Carrion</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2011 18:14:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1064</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Here's a preview of the next Boss Carrion release.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1065" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion/attachment/toy-container-boss/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1065" title="Toy container Boss" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Toy-container-Boss-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="449" /></a>

Three different colors all on clear vinyl.

Lime green, Blue, or pink all with pearly tones going on.

Each one contains either five or six unpainted (or a few slightly painted) "unique" mini resin figures sculpted and cast here at PK headquarters.

Chibi Welt, Patsy Batsy, and Biter baby are all included inside each Boss!

So if you are a fan of my resin sculpts as well as my vinyl, this is the one to get!

The price will be $150 each.

These will be sold "Blind Bag" style, so no reservation requests or advanced sales will be accepted!

Sales info to be announced soon on this website!]]></content:encoded>

		<title>&quot;Mayhem Picnic&quot; resin set!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mayhem-picnic-resin-set/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 07 Apr 2011 19:33:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Available SOON!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1082" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mayhem-picnic-resin-set/attachment/mayhem/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1082" title="Mayhem" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Mayhem-487x500.jpg" alt="" width="487" height="500" /></a>

This is one crazy picnic for sure!

Limited to 4 sets only. All figures sculpted, cast, and painted by me.

Magnetic Pasty Batsy with optional base, Magnetic Biter-baby. Eel-face Chibi Welt,

and that nasty "Seagool" and his parasitic underling who, unfortunately, is stuck in the nest.

He must have smelled the fries.

All packed nicely in this fancy box!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1083" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mayhem-picnic-resin-set/attachment/mayhem-picnic-box/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1083" title="&quot;Mayhem Picnic&quot; Box" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Mayhem-Picnic-Box-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>Salamander Joe arrives!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/salamander-joe-arrives/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 08 Apr 2011 18:01:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1088</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[A preview into the not so distant future!

A very strange invader indeed!

The ability to pass into other dimensions, and travel about the universe at will has it's drawbacks.

You sort of gather up things you didn't intend to.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1092" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/salamander-joe-arrives/attachment/sjtest-shot-1-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1092" title="SJTEST SHOT 1" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/SJTEST-SHOT-11-395x500.jpg" alt="" width="395" height="500" /></a>

Salamander Joe will come with detachable "Biter mite" weapon.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1095" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/salamander-joe-arrives/attachment/sjtest-shot-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1095" title="SJTEST SHOT 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/SJTEST-SHOT-2-362x500.jpg" alt="" width="362" height="500" /></a>

He seems to think he can just come to earth push us around without a fight!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1096" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/salamander-joe-arrives/attachment/another-weird-invader/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1096" title="ANOTHER WEIRD INVADER" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/ANOTHER-WEIRD-INVADER-401x500.jpg" alt="" width="401" height="500" /></a>

Thanks to all who helped me make this weird one possible!]]></content:encoded>

		<pubDate>Sat, 09 Apr 2011 18:52:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="color: #201428;">If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a style="color: #201428;" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105">paulkaiju.com </a>for the official entry page.</div>
<strong> April Candy Boss Carrion!</strong>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1112" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-entry-form/attachment/april-bosses1/"></a><a rel="attachment wp-att-1112" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-entry-form/attachment/april-bosses1/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1112" title="April Bosses1" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/April-Bosses1-499x500.jpg" alt="" width="499" height="500" /></a>

April Candy Boss Carrion available in Pink, green, and lime with unique pearl coat!

These figures are available "blind bag" style ONLY. Color can not be chosen!

Each vinyl Boss is filled with 5-6 resin toy characters sculpted and cast by Paulkaiju!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1115" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-entry-form/attachment/april-boss2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1115" title="April Boss2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/April-Boss2-492x500.jpg" alt="" width="492" height="500" /></a>

This Boss will be $150 each, not including S&amp;H.

April Candy Boss Carrion is for adult collectors only!

The online raffle will be open from April 9th 12:00pm PST until April 11th 12:00pm PST.

Please, don't contact me with "advanced reservation" or "color requests" or any request for substitutions.

Non-winners will not be notified once the raffle has ended!

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

	<item>
		<title>April Candy Boss Carrion Raffle is over &amp; &quot;Mayhem Picnic&quot; resin sets info!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-is-over-mayhem-picnic-resin-sets-info/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 14 Apr 2011 17:41:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1125</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1126" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-is-over-mayhem-picnic-resin-sets-info/attachment/april-exclusive/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1126" title="April exclusive" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/April-exclusive-565x500.jpg" alt="" width="482" height="426" /></a>

Winners have been notified!

Congrats to those who won, and thanks to all who entered!

More Boss Carrion soon!

&nbsp;

<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="color: #888888;">Mayhem Picnic!</span></span>

"Mayhem Picnic' resin sets go on sale this Saturday at 12:00 PM PST!

Limited to 4 sets, each contains 4 hand painted resin figures exclusive to this set only!

Seagool, Patsy Batsy (magnetic feet), Biter Baby (back magnet), and Eel style Chibi Welt all in a very cool black box!

Each set will be $150.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1127" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-is-over-mayhem-picnic-resin-sets-info/attachment/mayhem-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1127" title="Mayhem" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Mayhem1-487x500.jpg" alt="" width="487" height="500" /></a>

The Boxes are ready to go!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1128" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-is-over-mayhem-picnic-resin-sets-info/attachment/mayhem-picnic-box-set/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1128" title="Mayhem Picnic box set" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Mayhem-Picnic-box-set-335x500.jpg" alt="" width="335" height="500" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>Mayhem Picnic Resin set!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mayhem-picnic-resin-set-is-available/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 16 Apr 2011 18:59:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1133</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<span style="color: #888888;">Mayhem Picnic Resin set</span>
<a rel="attachment wp-att-1165" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mayhem-picnic-resin-set-is-available/attachment/mini-resin-header-sold-out/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1165" title="Mini resin header SOLD OUT" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Mini-resin-header-SOLD-OUT-600x292.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="292" /></a>

Each box set comes with 4 figures, each in protective bag with header.

All designed, sculpted and cast by me!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1127" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/april-candy-boss-carrion-raffle-is-over-mayhem-picnic-resin-sets-info/attachment/mayhem-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1127" title="Mayhem" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Mayhem1-487x500.jpg" alt="" width="487" height="500" /></a>

Seagool -Two parts with jointed neck

Biter Baby - Magnetic back

Batsy Patsy - Magnetic feet

Chibi Alien Welt-Eel style

All figures are exclusively hand-painted for these sets!

Limited to only 4 sets in a special embossed box.

Mayhem Picnic resin set is for adult collectors only!

&nbsp;

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT!</span>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Kaiju for Japan! Tsunami Earthquake Relief!</title>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Sales for "Kaiju for Japan" have started!

You can find my very special painted "Chibi" Alien Welts, and so much other cool stuff!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1173" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/kaiju-for-japan-tsunami-earthquake-relief/attachment/chibi-hatch-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1173" title="Chibi hatch" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Chibi-hatch-600x483.jpg" alt="" width="418" height="336" /></a>

Visit <a href="http://gorillamouth.bigcartel.com/product/paul-kaiju-chibi-alien-welt-for-earthquake-and-tsunami-relief">here</a>!

Many great artists, great art, all for a greater cause!

Big thanks to Troy Stith for doing this AND especially all the other artists who contributed!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1172" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/kaiju-for-japan-tsunami-earthquake-relief/attachment/kfj_hires-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1172" title="KFJ_HiRes" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/KFJ_HiRes1-323x500.jpg" alt="" width="454" height="703" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Pollen Kaiser &quot;Fly in the Ointment&quot; and &quot;Pink Rub&quot;</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/pollen-kaiser-fly-in-the-ointment-and-pink-rub/</link>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">Pollen Kaiser "Fly in the Ointment"</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1202" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/pollen-kaiser-fly-in-the-ointment-and-pink-rub/attachment/fly-sold-out/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1202" title="Fly sold out" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Fly-sold-out-332x500.jpg" alt="" width="332" height="500" /></a>

Pollen Kaiser is back for spring and at war with your sinuses with this "Fly in the Ointment" Version!

Resin cast figure sculpted by me. Quality cast by the wizards of resin, Monstrehero.

Painted in quality metallic colors, with clear staff. (4 inches tall, 6 inches tall with staff).

This Pollen Kaiser is extremely limited and for adult collectors only!

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT!</span>

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #ff99cc;">Pollen Kaiser "One Off" pink rub version!</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1180" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/pollen-kaiser-fly-in-the-ointment-and-pink-rub/attachment/pollen-kaiser-april-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1180" title="Pollen Kaiser April 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Pollen-Kaiser-April-2-332x500.jpg" alt="" width="332" height="500" /></a>

Only one!

Grab it here.

For adult collectors only!

	<item>
		<title>New sculpt &quot;KING JINX&quot;</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-sculpt-king-jinx/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 29 Apr 2011 01:24:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1205</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[A preview of my next resin figure. KING JINX!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1206" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-sculpt-king-jinx/attachment/king-jinx-6/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1206" title="King Jinx 6" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/King-Jinx-6-566x500.jpg" alt="" width="566" height="500" /></a>

King Jinx was based off a Kaiju TV show concept a friend and I dreamed up in the early 80's.

&nbsp;

It's been on my mind for many many years, and I decided it was time to "Tack it down" so to speak.

Molds next. 7 parts with 3 points of articulation. Wish me luck!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1209" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-sculpt-king-jinx/attachment/king-jinx-4/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1209" title="King Jinx 4" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/King-Jinx-4-409x500.jpg" alt="" width="409" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>King Jinx resins preview!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/king-jinx-resins-preview/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2011 02:55:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1212</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Exclusive King Jinx figures will be available in my shop very soon!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1216" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/king-jinx-resins-preview/attachment/jinxed-out/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1216" title="Jinxed out" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Jinxed-out-406x500.jpg" alt="" width="406" height="500" /></a>

Backstory:

King Jinx was summoned from the "Hollow Earth HELL Trench" By the notorious Captain Slugbeard!

This giant creature has the ability to create and command thick PHANTOM fog, enveloping ships en route to major ports. It utilizes the powerful "Cobra Flash" on it's forehead to send false Lighthouse warnings and scramble the ship's communications , radar equipment, while they are enveloped in the thick PHANTOM fog. Confused, the ships are destined for destruction where King Jinx can feast upon the helpless crews and steal valuable cargo to fill the evil Captain Slugbeard's ever-hungry treasure vaults hidden on the dark side of New Catalina Atoll!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1225" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/king-jinx-resins-preview/attachment/king-jinx-bromide-card-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1225" title="King Jinx Bromide card 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/King-Jinx-Bromide-card-2-323x500.jpg" alt="" width="258" height="398" /></a>

&nbsp;

Mixed part King Jinx!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1213" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/king-jinx-resins-preview/attachment/mixed-up-king-jinx/"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1213 alignleft" title="Mixed up King Jinx" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Mixed-up-King-Jinx-551x500.jpg" alt="" width="551" height="500" /></a>

&nbsp;

	<item>
		<title>King Jinx resin figures in the Shop!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 21 May 2011 19:00:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1236</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<script type="text/javascript">// <![CDATA[
     function EJEJC_lc(th) { return false; }
// ]]]]><![CDATA[></script>
<script src="http://www.e-junkie.com/ecom/box.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1216" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/king-jinx-resins-preview/attachment/jinxed-out/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1216" title="Jinxed out" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Jinxed-out-406x500.jpg" alt="" width="390" height="479" /></a>

&nbsp;

King Jinx was sculpted, cast, and painted by Paulkaiju using high quality materials.

3.5 inches tall and 3 points of articulation!

The arms are removable for shipping and transport.

Each one is a craft of love.

King Jinx is for ADULT collectors only!

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">King Jinx "Red and Black"</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1255" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/attachment/black-and-red/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1255" title="Black and red" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Black-and-red-448x500.jpg" alt="" width="314" height="350" /></a>

Red base resin with black rub style. Limited to 3.

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">King Jinx "Black Metallic"</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1256" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/attachment/black-metallic/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1256" title="Black Metallic" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Black-Metallic-492x500.jpg" alt="" width="308" height="312" /></a>

White base resin, black and metallic paints with red eyes. Limited to 3.

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT</span>

&nbsp;

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">King Jinx "Mixed parts"</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;"><a rel="attachment wp-att-1238" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/attachment/mixed-up-king-jinx-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1238" title="Mixed up King Jinx" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Mixed-up-King-Jinx1-551x500.jpg" alt="" width="384" height="345" /></a></span>

Mixed part King Jinx. Made of random colored resin parts.

Note: Customer cannot choose color combination!

Limited to 4.

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">
</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">King Jinx "Toxic sea foam"</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1257" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/attachment/toxic-seafoam/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1257" title="Toxic Seafoam" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Toxic-Seafoam-451x500.jpg" alt="" width="358" height="383" /></a>

White base resin with blue yellow green and black details.

Limited to 1

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">
</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">King Jinx "Metallic Green"</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1261" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/attachment/metallic-green/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1261" title="Metallic Green" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Metallic-Green-417x500.jpg" alt="" width="349" height="417" /></a>

White base resin with metallic green and gold paints.

Limited to 1

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT</span>

<span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #00ff00;">King Jinx "Clear with green Fibers"</span>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1258" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/shop/king-jinx-resin-figures-in-the-shop/attachment/clear-green/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1258" title="Clear green" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Clear-green-496x500.jpg" alt="" width="354" height="355" /></a>

Crystal clear resin with green pearl fibers and tinsel inside. Beautiful!

Limited to 1

<span style="color: #ff0000;">SOLD OUT</span>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Medicom Project 1/6 Exclusive! Boss Carrion</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/medicom-project-16-exclusive-boss-carrion/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 24 May 2011 01:23:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1303</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-1304" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/medicom-project-16-exclusive-boss-carrion/attachment/0524_f-oh_1c1p/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1304" title="0524_F-oh_1c1p" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/6-Exclusive.jpg" alt="" width="265" height="373" /></a>

I'm very proud to announce the release of BOSS CARRION via <a href="http://www.medicomtoy.co.jp/top/">Medicom</a> of Japan.

I have been a long time fan and collector of Medicom's great quality products for many years.

It's an honor to contribute to Medicom's Project 1/6 line of quality vinyl figures!

The 2 colorways will be available in JAPAN ONLY via <a href="http://store.shopping.yahoo.co.jp/project1-6/0524ex08.html">Medicom's online store</a> on Sunday, June 5th at 12AM Japan Time.

Two different vibrant colorways on clear purple vinyl will be available. Painted by me exclusively for Medicom of Japan.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1305" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/medicom-project-16-exclusive-boss-carrion/attachment/medicom-boss-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1305" title="Medicom  Boss 2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Medicom-Boss-2-409x500.jpg" alt="" width="409" height="500" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Red Vinyl Boss Carrion Lottery June 4th 12:00 PST</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-vinyl-boss-carrion-lottery-june-4th-1200-pst/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 02 Jun 2011 03:34:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1315</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[24 hour Red Vinyl Boss Carrion Lottery! June 4th 12:00 PST!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1316" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-vinyl-boss-carrion-lottery-june-4th-1200-pst/attachment/redboss-5/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1316" title="Redboss 5" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Redboss-5-369x500.jpg" alt="" width="369" height="500" /></a>

12 Hour lottery! Red vinyl with metallic blue, gold, black, flesh, and pink with lots of hand painted details.

Vintage looking and quite exotic.

Red Boss Carrion will be $90 plus S &amp; H

Online form will be available ON THIS BLOG June 4th 12:00 PST. Form will be available 24 hours only.

Winners will be notified within 72 hours after lottery ending.

Advanced email requests for reservations, requests for special variations, and MULTIPLE entries, will not be tolerated!

Non winners will not be notified.

For adult collectors only!

See you Saturday!]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Red Boss Carrion Raffle Entry Form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-boss-carrion-raffle-entry-form/</link>

		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="color: #201428;">If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a style="color: #201428;" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105">paulkaiju.com </a>for the official entry page.</div>
<a rel="attachment wp-att-1345" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/red-boss-carrion-raffle-entry-form/attachment/red-boss6/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1345" title="Red Boss6" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Red-Boss6-351x500.jpg" alt="" width="351" height="500" /></a>

Boss Carrion in Red vinyl with metallic blue, gold, black, flesh, and pink with lots of hand painted details.

Vintage looking and quite exotic!

$90 plus S &amp; H. Adult collectors only.

International entries are welcome.

Winners will be chosen within 72 hours after Lottery ending.

Non winners will not be notified.

Advanced email requests for reservations, requests for special variations, and MULTIPLE entries, will not be tolerated!

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Sofubi Godfathers&quot; show at TAG</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sofubi-godfathers-show-at-tag/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 07 Jul 2011 19:03:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1360</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-1361" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sofubi-godfathers-show-at-tag/attachment/sofubi-logo-2/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1361" title="sofubi-logo-2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/sofubi-logo-2-600x424.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="424" /></a>

5 man show at <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/">Toy Art Gallery</a> tomorrow.

Sofubi, in Japan means "soft vinyl toy".

Bob Conge/Placebo, Lash/ Mutant Vinyl Hardcore, Mark Nagata/ Maxtoy,

Blobpus and myself broke out the "heat guns" for this amazing show.

It won't get better than this! You can't refuse!

SOFUBI GODFATHERS opens July 8th, 2011 from 7 PM  11 PM and runs until July 19th.

Preview and more info <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/shows/current-shows/sofubi-godfathers-preview/">here</a>!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1362" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sofubi-godfathers-show-at-tag/attachment/boss/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1362" title="Boss" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/Boss-387x500.jpg" alt="" width="387" height="500" /></a>

3 one off Bosses for the show!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1365" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sofubi-godfathers-show-at-tag/attachment/salamander-joes/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1365" title="Salamander Joes" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/Salamander-Joes-413x500.jpg" alt="" width="413" height="500" /></a>

3 of four special Salamander Joe for the show!

	<item>
		<title>SDCC All Star comicon schedule</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-all-star-comicon-schedule/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 20 Jul 2011 05:27:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1372</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<strong> </strong>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1374" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/sdcc-all-star-comicon-schedule/attachment/gfs2011-final-lo/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1374" title="GFS2011.FINAL-lo" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/GFS2011.FINAL-lo-350x500.jpg" alt="" width="350" height="500" /></a>

<strong>Thursday, July 21 2011</strong>
<div><strong>
All Star Bazaar -Open - 2pm </strong></div>
<div>A  smorgasbordof Global Figure goodness including mini minis from UAMOU,  newMillennialMonsters from BloBpuS, Barbarians from Frenzy Bros., new  aliens from Galaxy People PLUS select goodies from the FIG-X.JP  warehouse.</div>
<div><strong>Team Europa - 2pm - close</strong></div>
<div>The Tarantulas, Triclops &amp; Bruno Orbit bring a touch of Continental Class to the Symposium.</div>
<div>

<hr />

<strong>Friday, July 22 2011</strong>

</div>
<div><strong>
All Star Bazaar -Open - 1pm </strong></div>
<div>Return of the morning buffet of figure entrees.
<strong>
</strong></div>
<div><strong>Paul Kaiju - 1pm - 3pm</strong></div>
<div>The West Coast Master of Monsters will hold forth with a cornucopia of his latest creations.</div>
<div><strong>Suckadelic</strong> - <strong>3pm - 5pm</strong></div>
<div>The East Coast King of Bootleg Action Figures holds court with a bevy of hot Necromancerexclusivesand sexy sidekicks.</div>
<div><strong>Monster Worship - 5pm - 7pm</strong></div>
<div>Newcomer to the  Symposium - Monster Worship will be dropping new vinyl goodness from  their All Star roster including Johnny Ryan, Jeff Lam and Mark Rudolph.&nbsp;

<hr />

<strong>Saturday, July 23, 2011</strong>
<div>
<div><strong>All Star Bazaar -Open - 12pm </strong>
Your first stop in the morning to tide you over for a long Saturday of Figure overload.</div>
</div>
</div>
<strong>L'Amour Supreme &amp; Fiends - 12pm - 2pm</strong>
IllustratorProvocateurL'Amour Supreme is bringing an All-Star  entourage of artists to the table for 2 hours of creative chaos. Rumored  yet unconfirmed names culled from the Twitosphere have included  Skinner, Count Chocula, TWERPS,theCreature from Laguna Beach, COOP,  and Beezelbub Jr.

<strong>Monstre Sean's Resin Emporium - 2pm - 5pm</strong>
Monstre Hero and UHOH toys team up to bring us a crunchy selection of cutting edge Resin-based Figures

<strong>Vectar's Saturday Night Special - 5pm - 7pm</strong>
He's Baaaack. Second tier toyvillaincrashes the Symposium to drop a  glyos-compatibleversion of himself. He will be joined in his capers by  SideKick Lab. It might get messy.

<hr />

<strong>Sunday, July 24, 2011</strong><strong>
</strong><strong>The Final Battle: All Stars versus the End of Time</strong>
<strong>
</strong>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Glowmelon Salamander Joe Lottery Form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/glowmelon-salamander-joe-lottery-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 30 Jul 2011 16:01:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1394</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="color: #201428;">If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a style="color: #201428;" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105">paulkaiju.com </a>for the official entry page.</div>
Glowmelon version of the bizarre invader from another dimension Salamander Joe!

24 Hour lottery. Glow vinyl with metallic green, gold, and pink. Includes "Bitermite" arm weapon.

A very unusual glowing texture in the dark. Alien and quite mysterious.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1404" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/glowmelon-salamander-joe-lottery-july-30th-1200pst/attachment/glowmelon-glow/"><img title="Glowmelon glow" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/Glowmelon-glow-436x500.jpg" alt="" width="262" height="300" /></a>

Glowmelon Salamander Joe will be $90 plus S &amp; H.

For adult collectors only!

International entries are welcome.

Winners will be chosen within 72 hours after Lottery ending.

Non winners will not be notified.

Advanced email requests for reservations, requests for special variations, and MULTIPLE entries, will not be tolerated!

	<item>
		<title>Glowmelon Salamander Joe Lottery! July 30th 12:00PST</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/glowmelon-salamander-joe-lottery-july-30th-1200pst/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 29 Jul 2011 00:13:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1396</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a rel="attachment wp-att-1397" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/glowmelon-salamander-joe-lottery-july-30th-1200pst/attachment/glowmelon/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1397" title="Glowmelon" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/Glowmelon-406x500.jpg" alt="" width="406" height="500" /></a>

This Saturday July 30th at 12:00 PST.

Glowmelon version of the bizarre invader from another dimension Salamander Joe!

24 Hour lottery. Glow vinyl with metallic green, gold, and pink. Includes "Bitermite" arm weapon.

A very unusual glowing texture in the dark. Alien and quite mysterious.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1404" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/glowmelon-salamander-joe-lottery-july-30th-1200pst/attachment/glowmelon-glow/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1404" title="Glowmelon glow" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/Glowmelon-glow-436x500.jpg" alt="" width="262" height="300" /></a>

Glowmelon Salamander Joe will be $90 plus S &amp; H.

Online form will be available ON THIS BLOG July 30th 12:00 PST. Form will be available 24 hours only.

Winners will be notified within 72 hours after lottery ending.

Advanced email requests for reservations, requests for special variations, and MULTIPLE entries, will not be tolerated!

Non winners will not be notified.

For adult collectors only!

See you Saturday!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Recovered from SDCC 2011!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/recovered-from-sdcc-2011/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 15 Aug 2011 18:57:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1434</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Finally getting back on track after a wild SDCC 2011.

Thanks to all who came to visit my home and the booth, purchased my items with the patience and grace that make this hobby all worth it.

Great new colorways of current figures resin and vinyl, new sculpts and surprises comming soon!

Here's a preview from the "test lab".

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1435" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/recovered-from-sdcc-2011/attachment/throwbacks/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1435" title="Throwbacks" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/Throwbacks-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

Also, Salamander Joe shirts are <a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/store">available</a>! Click the "shirts" tab above!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Toy Karma 3 at Rotofugi</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toy-karma-3-at-rotofugi/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Sep 2011 16:00:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1444</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: left;">I'll have 5 one of a kind pieces in this years Toy Karma 3 show.</p>
<a href="http://www.toykarma.rotofugi.com/">Toy Karma 3</a> , curated by Mark Nagata of <a href="http://maxtoyco.com/">Max Toy Company</a> opens tonight at Rotofugi Gallery in Chicago and goes until October 2nd.

MANY great artists in this show, and some amazing exclusives available this event only!

As usual, it's an honor and a pleasure to take part of what looks like another AMAZING Toy Karma!

Toy Karma is a great reminder that we are all a part of one great monster island, and great toys come in ALL shapes and sizes.

Variety is a main ingredient vintage recipe of this ever delicious vinyl gravy base we now enjoy, not just some vending machine trend.

Itadakimatsu!

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1445" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toy-karma-3-at-rotofugi/attachment/tk3-amapro/"><img class="size-full wp-image-1445 alignnone" title="tk3-amapro" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/tk3-amapro.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="329" /></a>

<em>Saihatari by Amapro</em>

<em>
</em>

A preview of 3 one of a kind figures I will have in the show.

<em>Citrus Boss</em>

<em><a rel="attachment wp-att-1446" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toy-karma-3-at-rotofugi/attachment/citrus-boss/"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1446 alignnone" title="CITRUS BOSS" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/CITRUS-BOSS--339x500.jpg" alt="" width="203" height="300" /></a></em>

<em>"Ape Phase" Salamander Joe</em>
<div>
<div>
<div><a rel="attachment wp-att-1447" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toy-karma-3-at-rotofugi/attachment/ape-phase/"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1447 alignnone" title="Ape phase" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/Ape-phase-354x500.jpg" alt="" width="212" height="300" /></a></div>
<div style="text-align: left;"><em>"Amoeba Face" Salamander Joe</em></div>
<div><em>
</em></div>
<div><em><a rel="attachment wp-att-1448" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toy-karma-3-at-rotofugi/attachment/amoeba-face/"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1448 alignnone" title="Amoeba face" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/Amoeba-face-304x500.jpg" alt="" width="182" height="300" /></a>
</em></div>
<div style="text-align: left;"><em> </em></div>
<div><em>
</em></div>
<div style="text-align: left;">Toy Karma 3
Art Inspired by Classic Japanese ToysRotofugi Gallery
2780 N. Lincoln Ave.
Chicago, Illinois, US</div>
<div>
<p style="text-align: left;">Opening Reception
Saturday, September 10
7-10PM</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">Exhibit Continues through October 2</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><strong>More info <a href="http://www.toykarma.rotofugi.com/?page_id=56">HERE</a></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><strong><a rel="attachment wp-att-1495" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/toy-karma-3-at-rotofugi/attachment/tk3_hybrid/"><img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-1495" title="TK3_Hybrid" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/TK3_Hybrid-600x283.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="283" /></a>
</strong></p>

	<item>
		<title>GUUMON X Paulkaiju Daigomi Tissue X &amp; Y in the shop</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/guumon-x-paulkaiju-daigomi-tissue-x-y-in-the-shop/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 22 Sep 2011 17:24:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1502</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In the shop!

A collaboration between the vinyl Laboratories of <a href="http://guumon.blogspot.com/">GUUMON</a> and Paulkaiju spawns Tissue X &amp; Y.

A thick piece of 8 inch tall vinyl. Only ONE of each available in the <a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/">shop</a>.

&nbsp;

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1504" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/guumon-x-paulkaiju-daigomi-tissue-x-y-in-the-shop/attachment/pk-x-guumon-tissue-x-y/"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1504 alignnone" title="PK X GUUMON TISSUE X &amp; Y" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/PK-X-GUUMON-TISSUE-X-Y-502x500.jpg" alt="" width="502" height="500" /></a>

Tissue X, green, pink and metallic on glow vinyl.

Tissue Y Pink, blue and metallic on clear vinyl.

$160 each plus S &amp; H. For adult collectors only!

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

		<title>NYCC 2011 releases via Lulubell Toys!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/nycc-2011-releases-via-lulubell-toys/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 06 Oct 2011 04:54:44 +0000</pubDate>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Although I won't personally be at NYCC.

<a href="http://www.lulubelltoys.com/">Lulubell Toys</a> will be hosting my figures this year at booth #589.

Release schedule TBA!

Seagool!

	<item>
		<title>NYCC release line-up announced</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/nycc-release-line-up-announced/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 13 Oct 2011 17:19:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1514</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Thursday/Preview Night: </strong>

<a href="http://www.paulkaiju.com/">Paul Kaiju</a>  4PM Exclusive Seagools, Boss Carrions, and other surprises
Grody Shogun - 5-6PM Special Grody Mash-Up Release &amp; Signing

The rest of the schedule here at the great <a href="http://www.vinylpulse.com/2011/10/lulubell-toys-nycc-release-line-up-after-con-events.html">Vinyl Pulse blog</a>.

Also, a very special release at the<a href="http://www.thecottoncandymachine.com/events/show/cherry-vinyl"> Cotton Candy Machine</a> in Brooklyn!

If you miss it...

I'm gearing up for a WELL overdue releases of Boss and Joe online one week after!

Please hang tight!

I've been busy "engineering" something pretty damn special that involves my partner in toy crime, <a href="http://super-junk.com/">Super-Junk</a> .

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1515" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/nycc-release-line-up-announced/attachment/strawberry-evil/"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1515 alignnone" title="Strawberry evil" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/Strawberry-evil-600x356.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="214" /></a>

&nbsp;

More next post!

	<item>
		<title>October &quot;Header&quot; style Salamander Joe Lottery</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/october-header-style-salamander-joe-lottery/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 20 Oct 2011 18:43:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1522</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[24 hour Lottery

ONLINE Form will appear on this Blog
Saturday, October 22nd. 12:00 PST

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1523" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/october-header-style-salamander-joe-lottery/attachment/october-salamander-joe/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1523" title="October Salamander Joe" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/October-Salamander-Joe-442x500.jpg" alt="" width="442" height="500" /></a>

"Header" style Salamander Joe. Pink, Red, and various metallic sprays on blue vinyl.

$100 each plus S &amp; H.

Winners will be chosen within 72 hours after lottery has ended.

Requests for alterations, advanced reservations,

multiple entries, and entries not using the online form will not be tolerated.

Salamander Joe is for adult collectors only please!

See you Saturday!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Salamander Joe &quot;Header&quot; colorway entry form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/salamander-joe-header-colorway-entry-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 22 Oct 2011 19:00:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1528</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="color: #201428;">If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a style="color: #201428;" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105">paulkaiju.com </a>for the official entry page.</div>
"Header" colorway of the bizarre invader from another dimension Salamander Joe!

24 Hour lottery. Blue vinyl with pink, red, and assorted metallics  Includes "Bitermite" arm weapon.

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1523" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/october-header-style-salamander-joe-lottery/attachment/october-salamander-joe/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1523" title="October Salamander Joe" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/October-Salamander-Joe-442x500.jpg" alt="" width="442" height="500" /></a>

&nbsp;

"Header" Salamander Joe will be $100 plus S &amp; H.

For adult collectors only!

International entries are welcome.

Winners will be chosen within 72 hours after Lottery ending.

Non winners will not be notified.

Advanced email requests for reservations, requests for special variations, and MULTIPLE entries, will not be tolerated!

<!--cforms name="raffle  (header sallys) "-->]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Dark Days Ahead Designercon 2011</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/dark-days-ahead-designercon-2011/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Oct 2011 04:35:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1549</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1550" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/dark-days-ahead-designercon-2011/attachment/dark-days-ahead-5/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1550" title="Dark Days Ahead 5" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/Dark-Days-Ahead-5-369x500.jpg" alt="" width="369" height="500" /></a>

Those Days are creeping in!

The days seem shorter.

And it's dark before you know it.

And photographing your toys becomes a hassle.

Because nothing beats damn natural light does it. Why is this?

&nbsp;

Join me at <a href="http://www.designercon.com/">Desingnercon</a> in Pasedena. Novemeber 11 2011

&nbsp;

Booth #211.

I will join with Monstrehero and best of all, Uhoh toys to usher in the temporary end of that special light.

Get ready for a blast.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[There's a new Partyball in town! He is quite beautiful. Thanks Super 7!

Via Super 7's Blog: <a href="http://blog.super7store.com/fight-party-friday-fright-night-zombiefighter">HERE</a>

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1563" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-super-7-glowing-lava-partyball/attachment/super7_x_paul_kaiju_monster_fa-jpg-scaled-500/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1563" title="Super7_x_Paul_Kaiju_Monster_Fa.jpg.scaled.500" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/Super7_x_Paul_Kaiju_Monster_Fa.jpg.scaled.500.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="375" /></a>

&nbsp;

"Joining the fight in the right corner is <a href="../">Paul Kaiju's</a> Monster Family Glowing Lava Partyball. Half monster, half machine,  Partyball is the life of the party - until he decides to destroy it.  Partyball is cast in GID vinyl with Orange, Brown and Gold sprays. $35  each."

<strong>ZombieFighter and Partyball will be available for sale this Friday, December 9th at Noon Pacific at the Super7 Store and <a href="http://super7store.com/">online</a>.</strong>]]></content:encoded>
