	<item>
		<title>January pickings preview &amp; Poison Touch Lottery!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/january-pickings-preview-poison-touch-lottery/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 Jan 2012 22:58:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1584</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Happy 2012 all!

I've been preparing vinyl objects for January release!

Salamander Joe "Poison Touch" 24 hour lottery form will appear on this blog 1/14/12 at 12:00 PST ( California time!)!

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1592" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/january-pickings-preview-poison-touch-lottery/attachment/poison-touch/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1592" title="Poison Touch" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Poison-Touch-377x500.jpg" alt="" width="377" height="500" /></a>

&nbsp;

The following "limited amount" items will appear in the <a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/store">shop</a> this Saturday at an undisclosed time!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15476" target="_blank">"Red Eye" Boss Carrion</a>:

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15476" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1585" title="Red Eye" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Red-Eye-341x500.jpg" alt="" width="341" height="500" /></a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15477" target="_blank">"Swamp Gas" Seagool</a>:

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15477" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1586" title="Swamp gas" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Swamp-gas-362x500.jpg" alt="" width="362" height="500" /></a>

Also, there will be a release of individual hand paints!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15475">Glow Polar</a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15475" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1587" title="Glow Polar" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Glow-Polar-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15472" target="_blank">Hot Schnapps</a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15472" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1588" title="Hot Schnapps" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Hot-Schnapps-356x500.jpg" alt="" width="356" height="500" /></a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15471" target="_blank">Bogart</a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15471" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1589" title="Bogart" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Bogart-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15474" target="_blank">Victorian</a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15474" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1590" title="Victorian" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Victorian-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15473" target="_blank">Dr. Martini</a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.limitedpressing.com/products/15473" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1591" title="Dr Martini" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Dr-Martini-379x500.jpg" alt="" width="379" height="500" /></a>

&nbsp;

See you Saturday!

&nbsp;

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Poison Touch&quot; Salamander Joe raffle form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/poison-touch-salamander-joe-raffle-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 14 Jan 2012 19:59:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1639</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a href="../?p=1105">paulkaiju.com </a>for the official entry page.

&nbsp;

Salamander Joe "Posion Touch" colorway.

Green, yellow, gold and metallic sprays on orange vinyl. Removable "Bitermite" included.

$100 each plus S&amp;H

<a rel="attachment wp-att-1592" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/january-pickings-preview-poison-touch-lottery/attachment/poison-touch/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1592" title="Poison Touch" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Poison-Touch-377x500.jpg" alt="" width="250" height="331" /></a>

For adult collectors only!

International entries are welcome.

Winners will be chosen within 72 hours after Lottery ending.

Non winners will not be notified.

Advanced email requests for reservations, requests for special variations, and MULTIPLE entries, will not be tolerated!

&nbsp;

<!--cforms name="raffle Poison Touch Salamander Joe"-->]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The crate!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/the-crate/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 18 Feb 2012 02:51:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1684</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>A Mysterious crate arrived at the Hotel Kaiju-fornia today...</p>
<p><a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/the-crate/attachment/arival/" rel="attachment wp-att-1685"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1685" title="Arival" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/Arival-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="269" /></a></p>
<p>What could it be? I'll give you a clue...and rub your nose in it a bit.</p>
<img src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/Bare-footin.jpg" />

<p>More soon!</p>

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Paulyvinyl State of Mind&quot; at Toy Art Gallery</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/paulyvinyl-state-of-mind-at-toy-art-gallery/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 28 Feb 2012 22:27:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1699</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Please join me March 3rd at Toy Art Gallery for my first LA solo show!

I've been working hard on this one. Prepare for many surprises!

&nbsp;

<a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/shows/current-shows/03022012-paul-kaiju/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1700" title="PAULYVINYL-livingproof" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/PAULYVINYL-livingproof-375x500.jpg" alt="" width="375" height="500" /></a>

Toy Art Gallery is proud to present Paulyvinyl State of Mind by the legendary Paul Kaiju! Pauls work needs no introduction; as a top-notch painter, sculptor, and toy designer he has taken the toy world by storm with his extremely original designs that are influenced by everything from Japanese Kaiju to 60s Sci-Fi to cheap squeaky toys. Be it Japanese soft vinyl or hand-casted resin, Pauls creations are truly unique and exquisitely crafted. He now brings this expertise to his first solo show at Toy Art Gallery with a multitude of his various characters in one-offs and editions in vinyl and resin, along with some big surprises!

PAULYVINYL is a limited engagement and opens Saturday, Mar. 3rd and runs through Mar. 18th. There will be an opening reception from 7-11 PM on Mar. 3rd with drinks, music, and good company. Join us at Toy Art Gallerys new showroom located at 7571 Melrose Ave. Hollywood CA 90046.

PURCHASING INFO: Tickets to purchase work from PAULYVINYL will be distributed FIRST COME, FIRST SERVE starting at 12 NOON on Sat, Mar. 3rd. One ticket per person. Please claim your place in line by 6:30PM prior to 7PM opening. Any remaining work will go online at <a href="http://shop.toyartgallery.com/">shop.toyartgallery.com</a> the following day.

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Paulyvinyl&quot; Thanks! Pollen Kaiser!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/paulyvinyl-thanks-pollen-kaiser/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 12 Mar 2012 18:40:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1704</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Thanks to all who helped, and attended my show "Paulyvinyl state of mind" March 3rd.

Gino, the entire TAG staff, Melissa, Howie Pyro, and all my friends made it so special!

It was one heck of a month's scramble to get together I'll tell you that!

I wish I would have had more but alas time made it all an uphill climb.

I'm glad to hear Voodoo went to a nice home. I miss him already!

Big thanks to Matt Walker of <a href="http://www.monsterkolorstore.com/">Monster Kolor</a> and <a href="http://nebulon5.bigcartel.com/">Nebulon5 </a>

for making this big one a smooth operation without a scratch!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/paulyvinyl-thanks-pollen-kaiser/attachment/cleared/" rel="attachment wp-att-1706"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1706" title="cleared" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/cleared-374x500.jpg" alt="" width="374" height="500" /></a>

It was a blast beyond words.

Some articles!

<a href="http://shop.toyartgallery.com/-c-33">LA Weekly</a>

<a href="http://www.vinylpulse.com/2012/03/seen-paul-kaiju-pauly-vinyl-state-of-mind-toy-art-gallery.html#more">Vinyl Pulse</a>

<a href="http://www.spankystokes.com/2012/03/recap-paulyvinyl-state-of-mind-solo.html">Spankystokes</a>

There's a painting, some wall sculptures and Pollen Kaiser Tshirts left at TAG. Go <a href="http://shop.toyartgallery.com/-c-33">GET</a>!

The shirt design was done in collaboration with Super-Junk, based on a sketch by me, and produced by TAG.

It is in celebration of the upcoming "Pollen Kaiser" vinyl figure sculpted by me, and also being produced by TAG.

More info on this big figure soon!

<a href="http://shop.toyartgallery.com/product_toy_info/-c-33/paul-kaiju-pollen-kaiser-t-shirt-black-p-1507"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1712" title="Print" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/pollen-kaiser1-416x500.jpg" alt="" width="250" height="300" /></a>

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>MOCKBATPOCALYPSE raffle form!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mockbatpocalypse-raffle-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 25 Mar 2012 18:59:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1723</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a href="../?p=1105">paulkaiju.com </a>for the official entry page.

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mockbatpocalypse-raffle/attachment/mbp/" rel="attachment wp-att-1746"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1746" title="mbp" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/mbp-396x500.jpg" alt="" width="317" height="400" /></a>

The raffle form below is to enter to purchase an exclusive hand painted Mockbat figure.

Colorways are picked at random. Mockbats are $150 each plus S&amp;H and for adult collectors only.

One per person. Multiple entries, advance reservations, and special color requests will not be tolerated!

<!--cforms name="raffle Mockbatpocalypse"-->]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Mockbatpocalypse raffle to purchase!  3/25 12:00 PST!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mockbatpocalypse-raffle/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 24 Mar 2012 18:11:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1729</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Mockbatpocalypse raffle to purchase very limited hand paint Mockbats.

ONLINE form will appear on the www.Paulkaiju.com blog.

Tomorrow 3/25 12:00 PST. 24 hour lottery ends 3/26 12:00 PST.

Winners will be notified via email after 72 hours of Lottery closing.

&nbsp;

A variety of Mockbats. Some, one of a kind. Some a few of a kind! All special!

Shipped random blind bag. each includes X2 alternate "belly blooms".

One Mockbat per winner. Advance reservations, special selections requests,

or multiple raffle entries will not be tolerated.

Raffle winner pays $150 plus S &amp; H! For adult collectors only please!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/mockbatpocalypse-raffle/attachment/mbp/" rel="attachment wp-att-1746"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1746" title="mbp" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/mbp-396x500.jpg" alt="" width="396" height="500" /></a>

<em>Photo does not represent all available paint applications or true quantity. Colors may also vary from monitor to monitor.</em>

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Uamou Exhibition &amp; Design Festa in Japan!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/uamou-exhibition-design-festa-in-japan/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 08 May 2012 22:02:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Hi all!

Off to Japan for <a href="http://www.designfesta.com/event/index_en.html">Design Festa 35</a> at Tokyo Big site!

Then it's Paulkaiju X <a href="http://www.uamou.com/">Uamou</a> Exibition on the 18th and the 19th.

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/uamou-exhibition-design-festa-in-japan/attachment/pk-x-u/" rel="attachment wp-att-1772"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1772" title="PK X U" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/PK-X-U-357x500.jpg" alt="" width="357" height="500" /></a>

See you there!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Izakaya superstars! Resuming the mission.</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/izakaya-superstars-resuming-the-mission/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 10 Jun 2012 17:21:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1779</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/izakaya-superstars-resuming-the-mission/attachment/the-final-izakaya/" rel="attachment wp-att-1782"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1782" title="The final Izakaya" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/The-final-Izakaya-600x449.jpg" alt="" width="360" height="269" /></a>

Still waking up thinking I'm in Tokyo after 2 weeks of being back. Post toy mecca shock!

What an amazing trip that was.

Many new toy deals were forged and special projects to be revealed in the near future!

Great time at Designfesta, successful show with Uamou,

and meeting the LEGENDARY Monster painter Goto San!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/izakaya-superstars-resuming-the-mission/attachment/goto-bat/" rel="attachment wp-att-1787"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1787" title="Goto Bat" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/Goto-Bat--375x500.jpg" alt="" width="263" height="350" /></a>

&nbsp;

Thanks to all who made our visit great! You can check out pics on my <a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/paulkaiju/sets/72157629641080834/">Flickr</a>.

Test shots and the big to do...

<!--more-->

FIG-LAB FINGER 5

Been awhile in the works, but the test shots are here!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/izakaya-superstars-resuming-the-mission/attachment/flff/" rel="attachment wp-att-1780"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1780" title="FLFF" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/FLFF-600x391.jpg" alt="" width="420" height="274" /></a>

Been doing test paints on these as well. Super fun to paint for those who are crafty!

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/izakaya-superstars-resuming-the-mission/attachment/sucklord-sd-pheyden-baby-huey-uncle-biter/" rel="attachment wp-att-1788"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1788" title="Sucklord SD-Pheyden-Baby Huey-Uncle Biter" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/Sucklord-SD-Pheyden-Baby-Huey-Uncle-Biter-600x420.jpg" alt="" width="420" height="294" /></a>

POLLEN KAISER

Our favorite resin sinus-annihilator makes his debut in vinyl.

Produced in association with <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/">Toy Art Gallery</a>. This is one beefy dude.

Test paints are in the works. Introductory vinyl is currently in production.

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/izakaya-superstars-resuming-the-mission/attachment/monster/" rel="attachment wp-att-1781"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1781" title="Monster" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/Monster-389x500.jpg" alt="" width="389" height="500" /></a>

Decided to paint myself one. I suppose there will be many hand paint versions.;)

SDCC you ask? It's going to be a little different this year! Stay tuned!

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

	<item>
		<title>S + M + F + U Thanks you!</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/s-m-f-u-thanks-you/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Jul 2012 18:20:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1793</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Thanks to all who attended Super Magic Funtime Unit at <a href="http://www.5andadime.com/">5 &amp; A Dime</a>!

Awesome coverage can be found at <a href="http://www.vinylpulse.com/2012/07/smfu-event-5a-dime.html#more">Vinyl Pulse</a> !

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/s-m-f-u-thanks-you/attachment/final-smfu/" rel="attachment wp-att-1794"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1794" title="Final SMFU" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Final-SMFU-600x202.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="202" /></a>

I would ESPECIALLY like to thank <a href="http://super-junk.com/">Super*Junk</a> for her killer graphics, Kris Funks and Vinyl Pulse, <a href="http://www.5andadime.com/">5 &amp; Dime</a> for hosting us,

Scott HMS, <a href="http://www.lulubelltoys.com/">Lulubell</a> Toy Bodega, Grody Shogun, Velocitron and <a href="http://www.spankystokes.com/">Spankystokes</a> for the nifty coffin.

&nbsp;

Most all vinyls sold out.

But I should have some nifty custom leftovers and shirts up in my shop

as soon as I get rid of this Nerd Flu! Bleh!

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Nederland Monster Jam at Concrete July 20th</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/nederland-monster-jam-at-concrete-july-20th/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 19 Jul 2012 21:20:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1800</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

Fellow Vinyl Kaiju maker Brian Mahony of <a href="http://guumon.com/">GUMMON</a> has curated this very special show

to turn-on some Dutch folks to the world of Vinyl Kaiju.

I managed to send off 3 standard size pieces (2 pictured below) before the madness that became SMFU.

What ageweldig (great!) selection of artists for this show! Can't wait to see the setup and how it goes. Thanks to Brian for the invite.

&nbsp;

<em><a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/nederland-monster-jam-at-concrete-july-20th/attachment/ax9bqf9ceaadwjk-jpg_large/" rel="attachment wp-att-1801"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1801" title="Ax9bqF9CEAADWjk.jpg_large" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Ax9bqF9CEAADWjk.jpg_large-363x500.jpg" alt="" width="363" height="500" /></a></em>

&nbsp;

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/nederland-monster-jam-at-concrete-july-20th/attachment/bc/" rel="attachment wp-att-1802"><img class="alignnone  wp-image-1802" title="BC" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/BC-346x500.jpg" alt="" width="208" height="300" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>Summers Cauldron: Elegab, Mutant Vinyl Hardcore, Paul Kaiju and Eric Talbot</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/summers-cauldron-elegab-mutant-vinyl-hardcore-paul-kaiju-and-eric-talbot/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 04 Aug 2012 20:14:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1809</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

August 10-September 9. Opening reception Friday, August 10 6-9pm.
<div>

<a href="http://blog.shopfoe.com/events/2012/01/01/elegab-mutant-vinyl-hardcore-and-paul-kaiju/">" FOE</a> goes big for their last show at the Pleasant St Location. 3 top indy toy designers from <a href="http://mutantvinylhardcore.blogspot.com/">Mutant Vinyl Hardcore</a> (CT), <a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/">Paul Kaiju</a> (CA) and <a href="http://dokurotarou.com/">Elegab</a> (JPN) are teamed up with local favorite <a href="http://erictalbot.blogspot.com/">Eric Talbot</a>. Expect plenty of illustration, one-offs, mash-ups, short runs and many more surprises. Come out see the art, say goodbye to 28 pleasant and hear more about our move to Main St."

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/summers-cauldron-elegab-mutant-vinyl-hardcore-paul-kaiju-and-eric-talbot/attachment/rounding-off/" rel="attachment wp-att-1810"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1810" title="Rounding off" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/Rounding-off-421x500.jpg" alt="" width="421" height="500" /></a>

&nbsp;

See you there!

</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>PAUL KAIJU x TAG Pollen Kaiser Black Edition Available Wed. 9/26</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/paul-kaiju-x-tag-pollen-kaiser-black-edition-available-wed-926/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 Sep 2012 00:41:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1830</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/2012/09/24/paul-kaiju-x-tag-pollen-kaiser-black-edition-available-wed-926/">Toy Art Gallery</a> announces Black edition Pollen Kaiser!

"Release Date: Wed. Sept. 26th at 12PM PST
Toy Art Gallery is proud to present POLLEN KAISER, our very first production collaboration with the legendary Paul Kaiju! The Black Edition is a beautiful emulation of PKs signature palette and technique, with metallic gold and blue sprays over black vinyl with red and yellow highlights.

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/paul-kaiju-x-tag-pollen-kaiser-black-edition-available-wed-926/attachment/pk_pk_blk-600x600-2/" rel="attachment wp-att-1832"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1832" title="pk_pk_BLK-600x600" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/pk_pk_BLK-600x6001-500x500.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="500" /></a>

POLLEN KAISER is designed and sculpted by Paul Kaiju and produced by Toy Art Gallery. He stands over 10 tall and features articulation at the shoulders, waist, and arms. He also includes a 3 piece, 12 tall staff accessory and a red doll eye."

&nbsp;

<a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/2012/09/24/paul-kaiju-x-tag-pollen-kaiser-black-edition-available-wed-926/">More info at Toy Art Gallery!</a>

	<item>
		<title>New York Comicon 2012 release schedule</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2012-release-schedule/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 11 Oct 2012 22:21:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1847</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2012-release-schedule/attachment/nycc2012-b/" rel="attachment wp-att-1848"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1848" title="NYCC2012 B" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/NYCC2012-B-328x500.jpg" alt="" width="328" height="500" /></a>

Unfortunately I will not be there this year. My great friends from Lulubell at Booth #3108 will be on hand to deliver the goods!

Tickets will be handed out at 5:oo PM til' 5:15. Numbers pulled at 5:15 PM! Be there and good luck!

Release pics and prices after the cut!

<!--more-->

"RED FUZZ" Mockbat. $150

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2012-release-schedule/attachment/red-fuzz-mockbat-nycc2012/" rel="attachment wp-att-1849"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1849" title="Red Fuzz Mockbat NYCC2012" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/Red-Fuzz-Mockbat-NYCC2012-340x500.jpg" alt="" width="340" height="500" /></a>

"Black Cat" Salamander Joe $100

"Candy Corn" Salamander Joe $100

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2012-release-schedule/attachment/candy-corn-salamander-joe-nycc2012/" rel="attachment wp-att-1851"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1851" title="Candy Corn Salamander Joe NYCC2012" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/Candy-Corn-Salamander-Joe-NYCC2012-377x500.jpg" alt="" width="377" height="500" /></a>

"Electric Punch" Boss Carrion LTD. to 5. $250

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/new-york-comicon-2012-release-schedule/attachment/electric-punch-nycc2012/" rel="attachment wp-att-1852"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1852" title="Electric Punch NYCC2012" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/Electric-Punch-NYCC2012-349x500.jpg" alt="" width="349" height="500" /></a>

	<item>
		<title>DKE Toys  &quot;Sausage Maker&quot; PK X Suckadelic Super Suck up! figure at DesignerCon 2012</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/dke-toys-sausage-maker-pk-x-suckadelic-figure-at-designercon-2012/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 01 Nov 2012 20:54:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1867</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In accordance with<a href="http://dketoys.com/blog/"> DKE </a>toys. A special collab between PK and Sucklord lands at DCON 2012! Paulkaiju is the Sausage Maker!

"Take all kinds of holes, any holes, secret "special" aged holes, and grind them into Sucklord figures with the consistency and smell of a soggy clipboard.

Then I took the figures, added a blend of secret herbs, spices, and Japanese paint and re grind them into ...

GAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAA... SAUSAGE!!!

"Sausage Maker"
by Paulkaiju x Suckadelic
Edition of 50
$100 each

<a href="http://dketoys.com/blog/">DKE</a> booth #124

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/dke-toys-sausage-maker-pk-x-suckadelic-figure-at-designercon-2012/attachment/img_1001/" rel="attachment wp-att-1868"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1868" title="IMG_1001" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/IMG_1001-333x500.jpg" alt="" width="333" height="500" /></a>

<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/dke-toys-sausage-maker-pk-x-suckadelic-figure-at-designercon-2012/attachment/img_1029/" rel="attachment wp-att-1869"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1869" title="IMG_1029" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/IMG_1029-333x500.jpg" alt="" width="333" height="500" /></a>

See ALL the rest <a href="http://dketoys.com/blog/2012/11/01/super-suck-up-big-reveal-post/">HERE!</a>

DKE booth #124 at 3pm will be hosting a signing and photo op with ALL ATTENDING Super Suck Up! Artists!

&nbsp;

Also, as a courtesy to people who cant make it the show and want to buy Super Suck Ups  DKE will be opening a special Suckline!

Basic info:
Suckline
323-250-DCON (3266)
open Nov 3, noon-5pm PST
Dont leave a message. Just keep on calling back until you get through.
They take all major cards. And they may be able to take PayPal as well.
More info here - <a href="http://dketoys.com/blog/2012/10/31/super-suck-up-hotline-or-how-to-buy-them-dang-figures-if-you-are-not-at-designer-con/" target="_blank">http://dketoys.com/blog/2012/<wbr>10/31/super-suck-up-hotline-<wbr>or-how-to-buy-them-dang-<wbr>figures-if-you-are-not-at-<wbr>designer-con/</wbr></wbr></wbr></wbr></a>]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[What a time it was! Quite an event. Now you can own a piece of art toy history!

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-1918" title="DesignerCon2012_1327" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/DesignerCon2012_1327-600x399.jpg" alt="" width="420" height="279" />

&nbsp;

PK X Sucklord "Sausage Maker" leftovers are available from DesignerCon 2012's Super Suck up!

$100 each plus S&amp;H.

GO to <a href="http://dketoys.com/blog/">DKE</a> to GET!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1916" title="IMG_1001" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/IMG_10011-333x500.jpg" alt="" width="333" height="500" />

	<item>
		<title>Black Pollen Kaiser and Luftkaiser blank versions available January 16th via TAG</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/black-pollen-kaiser-and-luftkaiser-blank-versions-available-january-16th-via-tag/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 16 Jan 2013 01:05:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1922</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Attention blank figure collectors.

Put away that acetone!

Here's a great opportunity to own on of my figs without all that annoying and icky paint on it!

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1923" title="blank" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/blank-500x500.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="500" />

Via Toy Art Gallery <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/blog/">blog</a>:

"Release Date: Wednesday Jan. 16th at 12PM PST
Toy Art Gallery is proud to present a new version of each of Paul Kaijus Pollen Kaiser and Luftkaiser! Each figure is cast is luxurious black vinyl with the Pollen Kaiser receiving a pink cats-eye, unique to this release. The unpainted black highlights Pauls expert sculpting and really lets the detail shine.<strong>Pollen Kaiser Black Unpainted and Luftkaiser Black Unpainted will be available on <a href="http://toyartgallery.us1.list-manage.com/track/click?u=958184bb51b3b6330750b6851&amp;id=87d6dc29bb&amp;e=caa00549fb" target="_blank">shop.toyartgallery.com</a> this Wednesday, Jan. 16th at 12PM PST. The 10 Pollen Kaiser will be $145 and the 4 Luftkaiser will be $35, limit one of each toy per customer."</strong>

Luftkaiser:

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1924" title="mini blank" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/mini-blank-500x500.jpg" alt="" width="500" height="500" />]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Unchiman "Deuce!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1931" title="Unchiman Deuce" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Unchiman-Deuce-376x500.jpg" alt="" width="376" height="500" />

&nbsp;

Metallic paints on milky white vinyl. 8 1/2" tall with 3 points of articulation.

ONLINE form will appear on the www.Paulkaiju.com BLOG.

Sunday 1/20 12:00 PST. 24 hour lottery ends 1/21 12:00 PST.

Winners will be notified via email after 72 hours of Lottery closing.

&nbsp;

Pupil position and color may vary slightly from figure to figure.

One Unchiman figure per winner. Advance reservations, special selections requests,

or multiple raffle entries will not be tolerated and will result in immediate disqualification.

	<item>
		<title>UNCHIMAN &quot;DEUCE&quot; Raffle to purchase entry form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/unchiman-deuce-raffle-to-purchase-entry-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 20 Jan 2013 19:59:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1940</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="color:#1D1427">If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to<a style="color:#1D1427" href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105">paulkaiju.com</a>for the official entry page.</span>

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1931" title="Unchiman Deuce" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Unchiman-Deuce-376x500.jpg" alt="" width="376" height="500" />

&nbsp;

Below is the online entry form for Unchiman "Deuce" vinyl figure by Paulkaiju.

24 hour raffle entry ends 1/21 12:00 PST.

Winners will be notified via email after 72 hours of raffle entry closing.

One Unchiman figure per winner. Advance reservations, special selection, modification requests, AND multiple raffle entries will not be tolerated and will result in immediate disqualification.

Raffle winner pays $110 plus S &amp; H! For adult collectors only please!

&nbsp;

<!--cforms name="raffle Unchiman Deuce"-->

	<item>
		<title>PSEUDOMORPHISM at Toy Art Gallery</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/psuedomorphism-at-toy-art-gallery/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 29 Jan 2013 16:49:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1958</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[I'm VERY proud to announce PSEUDOMORPHISM. My first show with the amazing and the ever inspiring Blobpus, Hanwa, and Yamomark.

Probably one of the most defining moments in Japanese vinyl collecting for me was discovering a picture of a mysterious new toy called Blobpus in early 2000. This toy had an aura of alien energy, the shape of an ancient Dogu, and the features of a humanoid-octopus hybridall of which are my kind of thing. I was hooked. The figure evoked high levels of mystery: who made this, how, and why? It took me months to obtain my first version, and once I did, Blobpus was one of the first figures of the independent New Wave of Japanese vinyl I ever painted. I was very inspired by Blobpus and his creator, Kaji Sanhe is one of the main reasons I produce my own toys today. Now I am very lucky to work with him on figure crossovers and collaborations, made possible by Toy Art Gallery. To me, the act of pseudomorphism embodies the first time I met Kaji San and his works. In a jet of amazing vinyl life forms that captivates you, he escapes off to think of more. It is a great honor to be sharing in Blobpus first Los Angeles show and visit!

<em>Blobpus harasses gardener. September 2006</em>

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-1961" title="Blobpus vs gardener" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Blobpus-vs-gardener.jpg" alt="" width="239" height="300" />

<em>
</em>

Via <a href="http://www.toyartgallery.com/blog/">Toy Art Gallery</a>:

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1959" title="BLOBPUSxPAULK FRONT" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/BLOBPUSxPAULK-FRONT-336x500.jpg" alt="" width="336" height="500" />

&nbsp;

"Toy Art Gallery is proud to present PSUEDOMORPHISM, New Works by Blobpus, Paul Kaiju, and Hawana, featuring figures by Yamomark. This epic grouping pairs the legendary Japanese toy artist Blobpus with his legendary American contemporary Paul Kaiju for an explosion of customized vinyl figures and collaborative mash-ups composed of an expansive range of their classic toys and characters such as Blobpus, Diablo, Boss Carrion, Mockbat, and many more. This synergy has also led one of Toy Art Gallerys most ambitious projects to date, a collaborative production figure created (and sculpted) by both Paul Kaiju and Blobpus known only as Vertebrata!

The show also features customs and paintings from frequent Blobpus collaborator Hanawa, whose bold paint applications pop against his unique monster designs (sculpted by Blobpus). Japanese toy maker Yamomark has also contributed his unique kaijin (humanoid monster) toys to the show, which feature gorgeous Blobpus paintjobs.

Psuedomorphism features:

- over 100 unique custom vinyl toys from Blobpus, Paul Kaiju, Hanawa and Yamomark
- a new entry in our Lifesize Fiberglass Figure Series
- special custom editions of Paul Kaijus Pollen Kaiser and Luftkaiser
- the debut of new vinyl collaborative toy Vertebrata by Paul Kaiju and Blobpus

Please join us, Paul Kaiju and Blobpus (in his first US appearance ) for the exhibit opening on Saturday, February 2nd from 7-10pm at Toy Art Gallerys showroom located at 7571 Melrose Ave. Hollywood CA 90046.

PSEUDOMORPHISM runs through February 23rd."

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1960" title="BLOBPUSxPAULK BACK" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/BLOBPUSxPAULK-BACK-336x500.jpg" alt="" width="336" height="500" />]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1958</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-01-29 08:49:37</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-01-29 16:49:37</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>psuedomorphism-at-toy-art-gallery</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="blog"><![CDATA[blog]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Clutter Gallery &quot;Monsters from the Island&quot;</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/clutter-gallery-monsters-from-the-island/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 09 Mar 2013 01:25:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1968</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://cluttermagazine.cmail2.com/t/r-l-uuuyhut-yktjhukrij-g/" target="_blank">"Monstersfrom theIsland"</a>is a group neo-kaiju and sofubi exhibition curated by<a href="http://cluttermagazine.cmail2.com/t/r-l-uuuyhut-yktjhukrij-w/" target="_blank">MonsterIslandNYC</a>. The opening will take place on March 9th, 2013 with a reception from 6-9PM at The Clutter Gallery, 163 Main Street, Beacon, NY 12508.

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-1969" title="poster.172427" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/poster.172427-375x500.png" alt="" width="475" height="633" />

&nbsp;

"Comprised of artists working primarily in sofubi and resin, the participating artists include: BLObPUS, Blurble, Bob Conge / Plaseebo, Brian Flynn, BuffMonster, Bwana Spoons, Dski One, Few Many, FigLab, Goccodo, Guumon, Healeymade, Ilanena, Josh Herbolsheimer, Konatsu, L'amour Supreme, Leecifer, Mark Nagata, Mechavirus, Monsterarm, Mutant Vinyl Hardcore, NagNagNag, PaulKaiju, Rampage Toys, Splurrt, Star Case, Toxic Creep, Uamou and Velocitron.

Several of the artists will be in attendance including a special U.S. appearance by<strong>SHIGERU (NagNagNag!)</strong>

The pieces will remain on display in the gallery space until April 6th, 2013"

&nbsp;

Here's my entries to this amazing show!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1972" title="Monsters from the Island" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Monsters-from-the-Island-456x500.jpg" alt="" width="456" height="500" />

&nbsp;

	<item>
		<title>323: Atom A Amaresura, Blickenstaff, Paulkaiju at FOE Gallery</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/323-at-foe-gallery/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 22 Mar 2013 23:23:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1977</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1978" title="FOE_323-Web" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/FOE_323-Web.jpg" alt="" width="288" height="369" />

From<a href="http://blog.shopfoe.com/events/2013/01/21/atom-a-amaresura-paul-kaiju-stephen-blickenstaff/"> FOE </a>gallery:
<h1>323: Atom A Amaresura, Blickenstaff, Paul Kaiju</h1>
Opening March 23, up through April 7
<div>

"We spent a road trip from Tacoma to Vancouver and back listening to The Cramps, Bad Music for Bad People. Its that album cover that made us aware of the artist <a href="http://www.stephenblickenstaff.com/">Stephen Blickenstaff</a>. FOE brings new works by Blickenstaff (MD) to Northampton for this 3 artist opening. Well also have the vinyl weirdness of <a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/">Paul Kaiju</a> (CA) and <a href="http://www.eonet.ne.jp/%7Eatom-a-amaresura/index.htm">Atom A. Amaresura</a> (JPN). Paul Kaiju was out in Western Mass last year as part of our <a href="http://blog.shopfoe.com/events/2012/01/01/elegab-mutant-vinyl-hardcore-and-paul-kaiju/">Summers Cauldron</a> show. We totally loved working with Paul and taking him out around town. It was during this visit that Jim and Paul discovered a shared interest in Atom A. Amaresura. Paul and Jim (with the help of our totally awesome intern Naomi) scored a slot in Amaresuras busy schedule. This gonna be one bizarre show.

&nbsp;

323: opens on Saturday March 23<sup>rd</sup>. Random pull tickets available when we open shop Saturday at 11:00 am. We start calling numbers at 2:00 pm. Limits will be set based on ticket pulls. Artists will not be in attendance."

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1980" title="Pollen Kaiser A" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Pollen-Kaiser-A-363x500.jpg" alt="" width="363" height="500" />

Pollen Kaiser

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1981" title="SALLY SWAMP TROOPER A B C" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/SALLY-SWAMP-TROOPER-A-B-C-375x500.jpg" alt="" width="375" height="500" />

Sally "Swamp troopers" A B &amp; C

</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Coming Soon. Blobpus Mockbat!</title>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[On the heels of our very special show "Pseudomorphism" at Toy Art Gallery, and our "Vertebrata" figure comes the next collaboration between Blobpus and Paulkaiju.

This very special and limited Mockbat will be available by online drawing to purchase. The Sign-up form will be announced here soon.

Stay tuned to this spot!

<em><strong><em>If you are in Japan, please check out the <a href="http://blog.goo.ne.jp/blobpus-mm/">Blobpus blog</a> for further information!</em></strong></em>

	<item>
		<title> Blobpus Mockbat raffle to purchase entry form 4-7-13 12:00 (PST)</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/application-to-purchase-blobpus-mockbat-sunday-april-7th/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 04 Apr 2013 02:10:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1997</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[ONLINE form will appear on the www.Paulkaiju.com BLOG Sunday the 7th at 12:00 PM California time!

The online form will remain up for 24 hours. A limited number of applications will be drawn for theopportunityto purchase. Winners should be notified within 2-3 days!

The price will be $150 plus S &amp; H. One per person only.

Please note! I WILL NOT accept entries to my personal email, other forms of advanced entries, or any "advanced reservation requests"!Multipleentries will be disqualified.

Entries from Japan will not be accepted, per agreement between Paulkaiju and Blobpus. Japan only sales of this item have finished!

Blobpus Mockbat is for adult collectors only!

	<item>
		<title>Blobpus Mockbat entry form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/blobpus-mockbat-entry-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 07 Apr 2013 19:07:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=2005</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to<a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/blobpus-mockbat-entry-form/?utm_source=feedburner&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Paulkaiju+%28Paulkaiju.com%29">paulkaiju.com</a><a href="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=1105"></a>for the official entry page.

Below is the online entry form for Blobpus Mockbat vinyl figure by Paulkaiju and painted by <a href="http://blobpus.jp/">Blobpus</a>.

24 hour raffle entry ends 4/8 12:00 PST.

Winners will be notified via email 3-4 days after raffle entry closing.

One Blobpus Mockbat figure per winner. Advance reservations, special selection, modification requests, AND multiple raffle entries will not be tolerated and will result in immediate disqualification.

Per agreement between Paulkaiju + Blobpus, This raffle isnotavailable to entries fromJapan. Thanks for your understanding.

Raffle winner pays $150 plus S &amp; H! For adult collectors only please!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1993" title="Blobpus Mockbat" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Blobpus-Mockbat-433x500.jpg" alt="" width="433" height="500" />

<!--cforms name="raffle Blobpus Mockbat"-->]]></content:encoded>

SLUGBEARD!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2019" title="Slugbeard" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Slugbeard-365x500.jpg" alt="" width="365" height="500" />

This big ugly twisted sea baby is scheduled for bath tub clogging and kiddie pool deflating this summer at a date to be determined! Stay tuned!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Boss Carrion &quot;Mystery Date&quot; set entry form</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/boss-carrion-mystery-date-set-entry-form/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 02 Jun 2013 18:59:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=2034</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="color:#1d1427">If you are reading this post via Email, RSS, or Facebook; Head over to <a href="http://paulkaiju.com">paulkaiju.com</a> for the official entry page.</span>

Below is the online entry form for Boss Carrion "Mystery Date" set.

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2025" title="Mystery date" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Mystery-date--400x500.jpg" alt="" width="400" height="500" />

Green vinyl Boss Carrion will include ONE of three uniquely painted "blind dates" picked at random.

Salamander Joe green vinyl:

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-2042" title="M3" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/M3-457x500.jpg" alt="" width="274" height="300" />

Mockbat flesh vinyl (includes alternate parts and Hellmock!):

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-2043" title="M2" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/M2-482x500.jpg" alt="" width="289" height="300" />

Unchiman flesh vinyl:

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-2044" title="M4" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/M4-411x500.jpg" alt="" width="247" height="300" />

Each set will retail $250 plus S &amp; H to be determined. For Adult collectors only!

Please note: One set per person, per household, per family. Reservations, special requests, MULTIPLE ENTRIES, MULTIPLE ENTRIES, MULTIPLE ENTRIES, orentries via comments or personal email will not be accepted or tolerated.

<!--cforms name=" Boss Carrion Mystery Date"-->]]></content:encoded>

		<title>King Jinx Vinyl test shot</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/king-jinx-vinyl-test-shot/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 06 Jul 2013 19:04:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Breathing out a web of evil fog, false beacons flash, directing ships to their doom.

Stealer of Gold and eater of men.

Lost technology resurrected, and run amok in the modern age!

A new creature joins the Paulkaiju universe!

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2062" title="Test Shot" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Test-Shot-453x500.jpg" alt="" width="453" height="500" />

Approved! Production is a go.

Release info soon.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>&quot;Time Funnel&quot; wrap up, and &quot;LOST WORLDS&quot; @ Stranger Factory</title>
		<link>http://paulkaiju.com/blog/blog/time-funnel-wrap-up-and-lost-worlds-stranger-factory/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 28 Jul 2013 16:32:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://paulkaiju.com/blog/?p=2068</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[First off. I would like to thank everyone who came out to SDCC and attended the "Time Funnel" event at 5 &amp; A Dime.

All the last minute shuffle that is SDCC turned into an absolute blast I will never forget!

Next destination, Albuquerque for LOST WORLDS: Creatures from Beyond at <a href="http://strangerfactory.com/">Stranger Factory Gallery</a>.

<a href="http://www.circusposterus.com/blog/lost-worlds-creatures-from-beyond/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2069" title="August_Slide" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/August_Slide-600x218.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="218" /></a>

"August 2013 brings a new group exhibit to Stranger Factory featuring the incredible monsters of<strong>Paul Kaiju</strong>,<strong>James Groman</strong>,<strong>Josh Herbolsheime</strong>r,<strong>Stan Manoukian</strong>,<strong>Joe Merril</strong>,<strong>Goccodo</strong>, and<strong>Mutant Vinyl Hardcore</strong>.

<strong>LOST WORLDS</strong>showcases the incredible creatures of a variety of top monster makers in the pop surrealist, kaiju, and art toy fields. From the gleeful carousing of French artist Stan Manoukians alien creatures to the unsettling realism of Ohio artist James Gromans sculpts, the roster for LOST WORLDS promises to provide creatures for all tastes.

The exhibit runs August 2nd  September 1st, with an opening reception on Friday, August 2nd from 6  9 PM."

<strong>Stranger Factory</strong>

<strong></strong><strong>109 Carlisle Blvd NE</strong>

<strong>Albuquerque, NM 87106
<a href="tel:505-508-3049" target="_blank">505-508-3049</a></strong>

I've done a few PK X Stranger Factory mash-ups for the show.

Here's a preview of "Stranger Sally".

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2074" title="Stranger Sally" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Stranger-Sally-359x500.jpg" alt="" width="359" height="500" />

<!--more-->

<a href="http://www.circusposterus.com/blog/lost-worlds-creatures-from-beyond/"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2070" title="Aug_frong" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Aug_frong-600x426.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="426" /></a>

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-2071" title="Aug_back" src="http://paulkaiju.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Aug_back-600x426.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="426" />]]></content:encoded>
